name: *Luxury Penthouse in the heart of trendy Zurich*
description:
Modern and unique penthouse apartment over three stories. Located in the heart of Zürich West: with art, design, food, culture, shopping & architecture in the center of attention. Spacious, luxury apartment with large Terrace, whirlpool, bbq, fireplace, gourmet kitchen and much more. Perfect access to public and private transport.

The space
One of a kind, modern three story penthouse in the famous cultural and business neighborhood of Zurich.

140m2 appartement is on the two highest levels connected via internal stairs. And your private 100m2 terrace on the rooftop.
A modern, spacious and bright apartment with all comfort you could wish for.
Guestroom and 2 separate bathrooms. Modern Bulthaup kitchen, living and dining room.

Music on all floors with Sonos and Spotify Premium, Highspeed Fibre Internet 1 Gigabit and Netflix provide ample entertainment and possibilty to work.

The top floor consists of a additional spa
neighborhood_overview:
Zurich is hip-circuit with the Swiss peacefulness!

Zurich-West – From Industrial Quarter to Trendy District
The district in the west of Zurich is full of contrasts, boasting an unpolished charm. Where ships were once built and engines bolted together, art, design, food, culture shopping and architecture are now the center of attention. Factories have moved away, leaving their vast expanses of space that creative minds have taken advantage of. The coolest place to live, work, dine, go clubbing in Zurich. This was a former industrial areas that has developed in a hybrid living working cultural space

History and national heritage
Historic monument
Fraumunster church : 2.00 km
Grossmunster church : 2.00 km
ZUERICH NATIONAL MUSEUM : 2 km

Culture and shows
Cinema (mainstream) : 300 m
RiffRaff (alternative cinema) : 700 m
MAAG MUSIC HALL : 500 m
SCHIFFBAU THEATER : right here

The space
This charming apartement (60 sqm) is in the middle of the old town in zurich, You can reach everything by feet … it has two sleeping rooms, a kitchen, bathroom and a living room. you will have the flat for you alone. It has high speed WIFi, a kitchen with everything you need for cooking. The appartement is in the 3th floor. In the first floor is a cupcake shop and next to it a Soup and Sandwich Take Away. The neighborhood is very nice, no cars, nice coffeeshops, nice other shops and restaurants. It is 2 minutes from the river limmat and 10 minutes by feet from the lake.
We have a wonderfull huge rooftop where you can see all over the city.
allthough it is in the centre of the city, the Apartement is very quiet.

name: Big and quiet bedroom in green area!
description:
The flat is quiet and has 3 rooms. It has a big balcony on the southern side - just in front of your bedroom. With public transport or by bike you get easily to the center (about 15') or lake (about 20'). We live in a green area and there are many supermarkets nearby. In summer, there are two amazing outdoor swimming pools in approx. 10' walking distance. We are a young, multicultural couple and open to receive guests from everywhere! We expect respect and thoughtfulness in return.

Guest access
You will have access to the balcony (there are two doors), bathroom and kitchen - all of them are shared areas. There is a big storage room outside the apartment where you can store your stuff if needed.

Other things to note
Minimum stay: 2 nights. Maximum stay: 14 days. Exceptions are possible upon request. Let us know if you have questions.
neighborhood_overview: We live in a very green, quiet and cozy neighborhood.
host_about: I love traveling, am fond of foreign languages and other cultures and am eager to meet people from all over the world! I expect my guests to be open-minded and thoughtful in order to have a very good time together ;) I am very helpful at any time, enjoy talking but can remain perfectly in silence as well. Looking forward to meeting you!

description:
The space
The Duplex flat is located in the northern part of Zurich, in a quiet living area. Close by to Hallenstadion, Theater 11 and Zurich Oerlikon. The flat is on 2nd floor and it has been completely renovated and newly furnished.
The apartment’s two levels give it a large amount living space ; living/dining room with fireplace and opening to the balcony, one bedroom with queen size bed, fully equipped kitchen with dish washer and glass ceramic stove, little breakfast balcony indoor, shower and toilet
On the first floor an open children’s bedroom with a double-bed and play corner, 2 bedrooms with each 2 normal beds, little bathroom with shower and toilet.
HIGHLIGHTS: an amazing view from the kitchen balcony to northern Zurich and from the front balcony to the nearby forest. Cable TV (channels in english, german, french, italian etc.), music station and Internet Wlan free of charge.

Capsule-coffee machine - hairdryer, iron and ironing board. <

name: bright and great duplex in the heart of Zurich
description:
The apartment is bright, extends over two floors and offers plenty of space in a central location.

It is possible to rent both one and two rooms together with the roommate (woman from Bologna).

Located next to one of the most beautiful swimming pools in Zurich, the place offers a lot of peace and is very well developed.
The apartment has style and space!

The space
Our spacious 4 1/2 room apartment is located in the center of Zurich.
It is stylishly furnished, very bright and quiet. We have 2 practical and cozy bedrooms, each with a double bed.
The 3rd room is a smaller bedroom.
There is WiFi throughout the house.
Two large balconies offer a lot of cosiness in the outer area. Shops in the quarter: Migros and Coop, butchers and bakers, all are just around the corner.
The area is full of cafes, restaurants, bars, theaters, art and cultural centers.
The forest (Üetliberg!) Is only ten minutes away from the hou
neighborhood_overview: Very nice people around
host_about:
ENGLISH:
I'm originally from Italy. It is always fascinating to meet people and other cultures. I like the variety of the travelers. 
Hospitality is for me very important.
I'm interested in arts, architecture, theater, restaurants and in the wonderful world of children, which teaches us every day to see life from an other perspective.
When we go on vacation, we can offer our apartment. However, I'm open for exceptions of various kinds. Please contact me without hesitation.

I speak German, Spanish, Italian, English and French.

Best regards
Violetta

DEUTSCH:
Ich bin ursprünglich aus Italien. Es ist immer wieder faszinierend, Menschen und andere Kulturen kennenzulernen. Ich mag die Vielfalt der Reisenden. Gastfreundlichkeit ist mir wichtig.  
Ich interessiere mich für die Kunst, die Architektur, das Theater, die Gastronomie und zu guter Letzt für die wunderbare Kinderwelt, die uns soviel lehrt und mit anderen Augen sehen lässt. 
Wenn wir in die Ferien reisen, können wir Ihnen unsere Wohnung anbieten. Wir sind jedoch offen für Ausnahmen verschiedenster Art. Bitte kontaktiert mich ohne zu zögern.

Ich spreche Deutsch, Spanisch, Italienisch, Englisch und Französisch. 

Beste Grüsse und auf Bald!
Violetta 

ITALIANO:
Sono originaria dell'Italia. E 'sempre affascinante incontrare nuove persone e altre culture. Mi piace la vastità che i viaggiatori portano con se. Sono come dimensioni che si aprano e ci aiutano a percepire l'amplitudine di questo mondo.  L'ospitalità è fondamentale per me. 
Sono interessata all'arte, all'architettura, al teatro, alla gastronomia, ma la cosa più bella è che ci ritroviamo giorno dopo giorno ad imparare nuove lezioni sul mondo dei bambini, che ci insegna a vedere ed a percepire la vita da un'altra perspettiva. 
Quando andiamo in vacanze possiamo offrire il nostro appartamento. Ma siamo aperti per eccezioni di vario genere. 
Non esitate a mettervi in contatto con me.
Parlo tedesco, spagnolo, italiano, inglese e francese.

Ciao! E forse a presto!
Violetta

name: Top location and top apartment in Zürich
description:
The space
In English
My room has 15.m2 and is bright as it has large windows on both sides. Also, the room has its own large balcony and a private large bathroom with large bath. The kitchen can also be used by Abspache. The laundry can be washed well in the home by washing machine and tumble dryer.

My apartment is very modern.

Guests have a top apartment for with use.

Two very dear and very mensché related cats (Leonardo and Sissi = 36 months old) are also in the same household. But will not be in Gästezimmer!


Good shopping and fast connection to Zurich City. There are the same in our house near a bus stop and there are very close to a train station and a tram stop which goes to Zurich City. Nr. 14

Guest access
Gäste dürfen nach Absprache auch meine Terrasse auf der anderen Seite der Wohnung benützen.
neighborhood_overview: Mein Gästezimmer hat ganz in der Nähe einen kleinen Einkaufsladen und will man in einen grossen Einkaufsladen gehen, so kann man mit der guten Busverbindung Nr. 75 nach Seebach fahren und dann mit der Strassenbahn Nr. 14 bis Oerlikon und da finden Sie für all Ihre Einkaufswünsche einen guten Laden. Wenn Sie in die Zürich City fahren wollen, so können Sie einfach mit der Strassenbahn Nr. 14 weiter bis zum Hauptbahnhof Zürich fahren und dann sind Sie mitten in der City.
host_about:
I have lived in Zurich - Seebach for 3 years and bought a great apartment. The guest room is about 20 minutes from the city, but can be reached by the streetcar No. 14 well.

I live alone in this great property and would like to give up on tourists and nice and clean guests the chance to stay with me so that they can get to know Zurich.
I work irregularly, but always sleep at home.
Have two cats (Leonardo and Sissi 6 years old) but have nothing against new roommates have. You are very nice!
Free internet

Auf Deutsch
Ich wohne seit 3 Jahren in Zürich - Seebach und habe mir eine tolle Wohnung gekauft.  Das Gästezimmer liegt ca 20 Minuten von der City entfernt, kann aber mit der Strassenbahn Nr. 14 gut erreicht werden. 

Ich wohne solo in dieser tollen Eigentums Wohnung und möchte gerne aufgestellten  Touristen und netten und sauberen Gästen die Chance geben bei mir zu übernachten, damit sie Zürich kennen lernen. 
Ich arbeite unregelmässig, schlafe aber immer zu Hause.
Habe zwei Katzen (Leonardo und Sissi 6 Jahre alt) welche aber nichts gegen neue Mitbewohner haben. Sie sind sehr lieb! Auch ab 22.09.2017 habe ich einen Tierschutz Hund. welcher aus Spanien kommt und 2 Jahre alt ist. 
Auch dieser ist sehr lieb und macht nichts. (Er hat bei mir ein neues Leben erhalten, da er bereits mit 2 Monaten bei einer älteren Dame nur auf dem Balkon sein durfte und somit keine Lebenserfahrungen machen konnte)
Gratis Internet

description:

name: Spacious room near center and university
description:
This airy room (20 sq.m.) is in our 1st-floor flat in a century-old character building. Our home is in a quiet area and just a 10-minute walk from downtown. Excellent links to the bus and tram system, with direct lines to main train station and airport.

The space
Non-smoking apartment. Spacious room, convenient location, pleasant neighbourhood. Room offers double bed (180 x 200 cm / 6 ft. wide x 6' 6" long), towels, desk, clothing rack, street view.

Guest access
Guests have access to the kitchen and shared bathroom facilities. Free Wi-Fi is available. Front and rear balconies.

Other things to note
We adhere to the recommended measures to avoid coronavirus infections. Your room, bathroom and kitchen are disinfected regularly. You will have your own sink, soap, towels, as well as a coffee machine and a teamaker in your room.

name: Private room in center of Zurich
description:
Quite and central location, walking distance to Zurich main station, city center, trendy Zurich West, river and lake.

The space
Modern furnished room with desk and chair.
- Free WiFi.
- TV
- Bathroom with shower next to bedroom. Towels, shower gel/shampoo provided.
- Parking on the premises available upon request (CHF 25 per day payable in cash upon arrival).
- Breakfast available if requested and agreed by host (CHF 10 per night payable in cash upon arrival). Please let us know at time of booking if you wish breakfast. Not always possible.
- Kitchen is not part of our offer.

Guest access
Bathroom

Other things to note
Check in time must be agreed before arrival. Check in is possible after 6 pm, however most of the time there is flexibility to agree a suitable check in time. Please contact us to agree on the check in time.
The apartment is on the 3rd floor. There is no elevator in the
neighborhood_overview:
- Zurich airport can be reached in about 20 to 30 minutes from the apartment.
- Zurich Kreis 5 is a trendy neighbourhood in the center of the city. There are plenty of restaurants, coffee shops, bars, take aways, cinemas, night clubs, boutiques, shops, summer open air bars on the river and river swimming within easy walking distance.
- Zurich Kreis 1 (city center) and trendy Zurich West are also within a short walk.
- There are jogging and walking trails along the river 5 minutes from the apartment.
- Thanks to the proximity to Zurich main station (Zürich HB) any place in Switzerland can be easily reached: Exploring other cities, excursions to the mountains including hiking and skiing in winter within 60 minutes.
host_about: I like traveling, reading, music, movies, doing sports such as skiing. swimmimg, hiking, gym, yoga. I enjoy city life as well as being in nature and discovering new places, meeting existing and new friends.

name: A spacious space
description:
What makes Spacious Space quite distinctive, is that the host takes personal care of his guests. Among several services that Roland provides, there is definitely one that stands out: the inevitably praised morning meal. One of the specialities of the house. Neither breakfast nor brunch, not continental or English. In fact, it has been carefully developed over the years. Call it "Spacious Space's Solid Standard", generous enough to save you lunch expenses in outrageously expensive Zürich..☺

The space
Spacious Space features:
A rare urban architecture, all rooms are glazed from ceiling to floor.
Surrounded by a garden, trees, shrubs and lawns.
Located as central as possible, 2 main tram lines and 2 bus lines,
all stops are reachable within 5 minutes. You then need:
17 min to the main station, Zürich HB
14 min to the city centre
34 min to ZRH airport, by taxi 18 min.
Free parking spaces, a rare luxury in ZRH.
But ther

name: Roomy well-lit Private room Heart of Zurich
description:
Two metro stops from Zurich mainstation. Cheap, convenient and central. Between Sihlcity/Manesseplatz. One spacey room of flat, on the crossroad of 2 train stations (S4, S10), Tram 5, Tram 13, grocery, butcher, and a bus station (Bus 66, Bus70, Bus72, Bus76, BusN5, Bus200, BusN12). One double bed, big table, hotpot, oven, WiFi, bathtub and "sofa" bed. Expect an artist’s apartment full of things. Good for easy-going people who are not bothered by clutter. Shared bathroom, toilet, and kitchen.

The space
Please inquire before booking! Absolutely no discounts or refunds as prices are already competitive! You will be rejected immediately! Absolutely no residential registration nor mail drop for short stays.

Train station just in front of apartment. Exactly two metro stops away (Giesshubel) on S4 from Zurich HB (mainstation) running every 20 minutes. A 10 minutes ride. Between Sihlcity/Manesseplatz near Schmiede Wiedikon. Available is a room of flat, on t
neighborhood_overview:
From Zurich HB, get off 2 Metro stops at S4 Giesshubel, and S10 Binz station almost comes to the door my apartment from Zurich main station, so it's very convenient. S4 runs every 20 minutes. In addition there are one tram station for tram 5 and 13, and a bus stop (Manesseplatz) for bus 72 (to Escher-Wyss-Platz) station nearby. Take the S4 subway, unless you have a GPS or a map! It takes about 30 minutes to get here from the Zurich Airport according to (website hidden) maps, if you are right on train schedule. I would say 60 minutes is more realistic.

In Manesseplatz is next to Schmiede Wiedikon where locals hang out. Famous Tattoo shop, Ink Tank across the street. There is also a restaurant with a yellow sign of a fork and knife across the apartment. There are nice restaurants around to discover. However, Zurich prices are very high.

Super convenient to just hop on the S10 train nearby at Binz to go straight to the top of the mountain at Uetliberg in 15 minu
host_about:
Please send inquiry before you try to book it.

Much like Darth Vader, I decided to stop working for The Emperor and decided to side with Luke Skywalker, Yogi and his friends.  Yogi learned me martial arts, and I like to carry around my light saber, and stow my aircraft in my apartment. 

Some Quotes:
"Unthinking respect for authority is the greatest enemy of truth."
- Albert Einstein

"Peace cannot be kept by force. It can only be achieved by understanding. You cannot subjugate a nation forcibly unless you wipe out every man, woman, and child. Unless you wish to use such drastic measures, you must find a way of settling your disputes without resort to arms." 
- Albert Einstein

"All of science is nothing more than the refinement of everyday thinking."
- Albert Einstein

"Now he has departed from this strange world a little ahead of me. That means nothing. People like us, who believe in physics, know that the distinction between past, present, and future is only a stubbornly persistent illusion."
- Albert Einstein

"We cannot expect to cross the rainbow bridge through a good act of contrition; that will not be sufficient. We have to understand." - Terrence McKenna

"Hastiness and superficiality are the psychic diseases of the twentieth century, and more than anywhere else this illness is reflected in the press." - Alexandr Solzhenitsyn

"My ultimate dream is to sow seeds in the desert. To revegetate the deserts is to sow seed in people's hearts." - Masanobu Fukuoka

"Men tend to have the beliefs that suit their passions. Cruel men believe in a cruel God, and use their belief to excuse their cruelty. Only kindly men believe in a kindly God, and they would be kindly in any case." - Bertrand Russell

"Live as if you were living for the second time and had acted as wrongly the first time as you are about to act now." - Viktor Frankl

"The sick individual finds himself at home with all other similarly sick individuals. The whole culture is geared to this kind of pathology. The result is that the average individual does not experience the separateness and isolation the fully schizophrenic person feels. He feels at ease among those who suffer from the same deformation; in fact, it is the fully sane person who feels isolated in the insane society — and he may suffer so much from the incapacity to communicate that it is he who may become psychotic. In the context of this study the crucial question is whether the hypothesis of a quasi-autistic or of low-grade schizophrenic disturbance would help us to explain some of the violence spreading today." - Erich Fromm

"World War III is a guerrilla information war with no division between military and civilian participation." - Marshall Mcluhan

"Reason is a harmonising, controlling force rather than a creative one. Even in the most purely logical realms, it is insight that first arrives at what is new." 
- Bertrand Russell

Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened. 
- Dr. Seuss

“It’s more important to know what sort of person has a disease than to know what sort of disease a person has.” 
― Hippocrates

name: cosy room in fully refurbished flat
description:
one bedroom in fully refurbished, fully equipped, old flat,
next to city center and main station but also close to Sihl river (Sihl valley);
with single bed, wardrobe etc
shared roof terrasse, public barbecue area

The space
a typical Zurich City OLD STYLE FLAT and fully RUFURBISHED, it is central but quiet:
the flat is LOCATED close to the main station HB and city center (approx. 1 km), there are also a tram stations (STAUFFACHER and Werd, in 5 min walking distance),
the street is a side street in a residential area, but restaurants and a bar are just at the square next to the building;

there are fast food stores (healthy and unhealthy) and coffee shops, supermarkets in just 5 min walk distance; and in another few hundred meters starts the night life area (Langstrasse)

...and we have a shared roof top terasse with beautiful view to Uetliberg, downstairs at the Hallwylplatz is a public Barbecue area
neighborhood_overview:
as said above Hallwylplatz is very CENTRAL and all you need is around in WALKING DISTANCE, also great connection with public transport,

just around the corner is the Sihl river - perfect for a walk or run to the SIHL VALLEY, or even uphill to UETLIBERG;

furthermore there is an indoor swimming pool nearby (50m lanes)
host_about:
I would like to share my great, spacious apartment via renting the guest room (preferably on weekdays) or sub-rent the entire flat (whilst I'm travelling) to long term guests, preferably business/ working women.

I personally love travelling, I stayed abroad in Argentina, Mexico, Peru, Ghana travelled often to Asia, in particular China, Malaysia...
and speak, besides German, very well English and Spanish, little bit French.

description:
Charming 3 room apartment in the 1357-built town house in the old part (Niederdorf) in Zürich. Climb the narrow staircase to the 4th Floor (no elevator) and enjoy the view over the Limmat and also the proximity to the active urban life of Zurich.

The space
The apartment is completely newly furnished and offers, in addition to the double bed in the first bedroom, three single beds in the other bed room, a living room and a fully equipped kitchen with enough room for guests. The bathroom has a shower and to wash the clothes we use the facilities downstairs.

This charming and exclusive "Schmidgasse III apartment" is just steps away from Limmatquai, the sights and the main station. On a side street of the vibrant "Niederdorfstrasse" in the old part-quarter. The 3-room apartment is newly renovated and newly furnished. The apartment is in walking distance from the central station, where trains bring you in 15/30 min departure cycles, to the Alps, to the urba

description:
We have a big bed room available in a lovely duplex apartment. The bus/tram/train stations are minutes away and can bring you anywhere in the city. Animated Oerlikon, with its village atmosphere and its bars/restaurant/market are down the street.

The space
The apartment has a real charm. Very sunny with visible roof beams. The room for guests is comfortable. The place is spacious and located in a charming neighbourhood, with easy access to the center of the city.

Guest access
You will share the apartment with me my wife and my 14 months son who is super sociable.

You have access to basically everything in the place including obviously the living room and the kitchen. You can use the washing machine and dryer if you needs it. Wireless access is available all around if you have your own device.

Other things to note
Our son Azad has joined us. Born in June 2020 he is super sociable and love meeting new people

host_about:
I am working in IT here in Zurich and have a tendency to work long hours. 

Before moving to Switzerland I spent 3 years doing an overland journey around the world. I rode my motorcycle from London to Vietnam, then traveled across the America from Ushuaia all the way up to New York. If you want to know more about my journey check out my blog lespassengers com or my fessebouc "les passengers"

I keep traveling from time to time and am delighted to host travellers as much as I can to keep an open mind and feed my curiosity. Now I can't travel as much I love to have the travellers coming to me ;-)

Within walking distance, several restaurants and shopping facilities and many clubs. By a 5 minutes’ walk you enjoy a beautiful relaxing area along the riverside. name: Mini-Musiker-Zimmer
description:
Im Herzen von Alt-Züri, bespielen Schweizer-Volksmusiker täglich die Live-Bühne des Kult-Lokals "Aelpli-Bar". Für sie stehen einfache Übernachtungsmöglichkeiten z.B im "Stockbett" zur Verfügung, welche auch von anderen Gästen gebucht werden können.

The space
Winziges Zimmer mit Stockbett - Toilette im Gang, die Dusche ist zugänglich durch das Büro der Aelpli-Bar.
neighborhood_overview: Das legendären "Dörfli" ist Ausflugsziel für viele Touristen aus der Agglomeration, der übrigen Schweiz und natürlich auch von Gästen aus dem Ausland. Weil dem seit Generationen so ist, ist das Angebot organisch gewachsen ... es gibt es fast kein Wunsch dem die hiesige Gastronomie nicht entsprechen kann ...
host_about:
Als vielbeschäftigte Mutter, bin ich auch Wirtin der Aelpli-Bar. Dort gibt es auf der Welt einzigartig jeden Tag frische Aelpli-Milch ab 17.00 Uhr und ab 20.00 Uhr, dazu live Musik. Die Aelpli-Bar ist seit Generationen ein Treffpunkt von Schweizer Volksmusikern, die hier gerne auch ihre STUBETE abhalten. Weil diese Künstler aus der ganzen Schweiz hier auftreten gibt es ab und zu Bedarf sie für die Nacht unterzubringen. Oft blieben diese Kammern aber leer, so habe ich die Gelegenheit am Schopf gepackt und biete sie auf airbnb an. 
Sollte Du den Wunsch hegen persönlich in Kontakt mit Einheimischen zu kommen fühle Dich bitte in der Aelpli-Bar wie zu Hause.

neighborhood_overview: This is a very lively area in the middle of restaurants, bars and  nightlife. The media call it the Hipster-Area of Zürich. Its a paradise for people who loves culture: There are 100 Restaurants, Bars, Cafes, etc. of all kinds in walking distance from the apartement. You can get Food from Swiss. India. Thai. Türkey Greek, Spain, German, and so on. The famous vegetarian Restaurant „Hiltl“ is just around the corner. As well you will find Clubs where you can go for dancing and enjoy life. This is „Kreis4“ of Zürich. The foodstore „Coop“ is in 100 meter distance and is open till 22.00h from Monday till Saturday. Please be aware, that it can be noisy at night sometimes on friday or saturday night, when the weather is warm and people are on the way.

Hi! Welcome (-:

description:
Our cool and cosy flat has two bedrooms and is ideally located to explore the city. 4 tram lines and 2 bus lines are a few steps away, the main station is only 3 stops away.
The flat is fully furnished and has everything you need to feel at home.

The space
We have two bedrooms with a king size bed in each (160 x 200).
Ideally, the maximum occupancy is of 4 adults or 2 adults and 2 children. . If you want to book with more adults/children, please write us and we see what we can do with additional beds.

Please be aware that the second bedroom is only available if you book for 3 or 4 persons. The second bedroom is on the same floor, but with a separate entrance. neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is quiet. You can find a bakery/coffee right across the street, a supermarket one tram station or a few minutes  away. As the city centre of Zurich is rather small, you can find everything you need, from shops to restaurants, in a short distance.
host_about:
We are a small family (2 adults and one small daughter) who loves to travel, get to know other cultures, places and people.
Travelling with airbnb has opened our minds in many ways and has shown us that there are many arrangements for living that are possible and interesting. We have brought many enhancing ideas back to our home, in some way, a little souvenir of our holidays.

We habe also started offering our flat during our holidays and we hope our guests feel at home, just like we feel when staying in someone elses home.

Looking forward to the next 1000 or so stays!

name: Bright and charming, in Zürich
description:
1 Bedroom Flat with a fully equiped open kitchen, luxurious bathroom, sep. toilet, big private terrace and balcony and a very comfortable king size bed.

The space
The flat is 65m2, very bright with fully glazed front and sliding doors, has an additional 40m2 terrace and a separate balcony. The flat has a separate room with washing machine / tumbler for your use only. The interior is partly furnished with antiques and design pieces, which we hope our guests will appreciate as much as we do.
The kitchen, which is open to the dining room/living room, is fully equipped with steamer, glass ceramic and gas cooker, dishwasher, fridge-freezer and is looking forward to creative cooks.

The location: a few minutes walk from Gieshübel station (4min to HB), 50m from Sihlcity Nord tram stop and shopping centre, in the middle of Zurich's Jewish quarter. Both the centre and the Uetliberg are within walking distance. The motorway access is also only a few minutes
neighborhood_overview: The house is very quiet, but also very close to the train station (4min walk) or the tram stop (1min walk). There are good shopping facilities, restaurants and cinemas in the immediate vicinity and you are immediately in the countryside. The Sihl River flows in front of the house, and a beautiful pedestrian and bicycle path leads to the centre in 10 minutes. You can walk from the house directly to Zurich's local mountain where you can enjoy a fantastic view of the city.
host_about: Soy argentina, vivo en Suiza con Oliver desde hace casi 20 años. Pasamos varios meses del año en Argentina y varios en Suiza; organizamos milongas, talleres y festivales de Tango argentino y también organizamos viajes para grupos pequeños de gente que quiera visitar Buenos Aires y el delta del Tigre, aprender a bailar tango, conocer milongas porteñas, aprender castellano y recorrer la ciudad.

name: Musiker-Unterkunft
description:
Im Herzen von Alt-Züri, bespielen Schweizer-Volksmusiker täglich die Live-Bühne des Kult-Lokals "Aelpli-Bar". Für sie stehen einfache Übernachtungsmöglichkeiten z.B im "Stockbett" zur Verfügung, welche auch von anderen Gästen gebucht werden können.

The space
Im Herzen von Alt-Zürich gelegen, ruhig. Leiste Dir einen Hauch Luxus.
neighborhood_overview: Das legendären "Dörfli" ist Ausflugsziel für viele Touristen aus der Agglomeration, der übrigen Schweiz und natürlich auch von Gästen aus dem Ausland. Weil dem seit Generationen so ist, ist das Angebot organisch gewachsen ... es gibt es fast kein Wunsch dem die hiesige Gastronomie nicht entsprechen kann ...
host_about:
Als vielbeschäftigte Mutter, bin ich auch Wirtin der Aelpli-Bar. Dort gibt es auf der Welt einzigartig jeden Tag frische Aelpli-Milch ab 17.00 Uhr und ab 20.00 Uhr, dazu live Musik. Die Aelpli-Bar ist seit Generationen ein Treffpunkt von Schweizer Volksmusikern, die hier gerne auch ihre STUBETE abhalten. Weil diese Künstler aus der ganzen Schweiz hier auftreten gibt es ab und zu Bedarf sie für die Nacht unterzubringen. Oft blieben diese Kammern aber leer, so habe ich die Gelegenheit am Schopf gepackt und biete sie auf airbnb an. 
Sollte Du den Wunsch hegen persönlich in Kontakt mit Einheimischen zu kommen fühle Dich bitte in der Aelpli-Bar wie zu Hause.

name: Calm Zurich City Studio - desinfected & clean
description:
Professionally cleaned according to the AirBNB roles, and the newest COVID 19 knowledge. 3-day guest-stop in between other guests. See also comments on my cleanness/hygiene standard.
Luxurious designed Studio in the city of Zurich. 3 minutes away from the main station.
Tasteful, with selected art and antiques, modern building. New/confortable BoxSpring bed. Small breakfast kitchen/Nespresso machine. Good heating and no Air-Condition. Overall: An oasis of relaxation within the heart of Zurich.

The space
Studio in the middle of Zurich City, in a very modern building. Stylish and with much Art and Design - a luxurous place to stay. 3 minutes to the main station, 5 minutes to Bahnhofstrasse. Europa-Allee and Google offices around the corner. Everything important in walking distance - shops, restaurants, cinemas etc.

Guest access
Top City-Studio with fully equiped bathroom/shower and breakfast kitchen incl. Nespresso machine, toaste
neighborhood_overview:
The most Zurich City place possible. Closed to Bahnhofstrasse and Main Station and next to the trend mile "Europa Allee", the offices of Google, where cultivated intellectuals live who sold their villas on the lake/Gold Coast, the most expensive Region of Zurich.

You must go to the lake, do some walking on Bahnhofstrasse , enjoy the cosmopolite athmosphere over here. Some steps away the best restaurants and the hipest bars and clubs.

It is amazing. And everythin in walking distance.
host_about:
tidy - cultivated - organized

We have appartments in Zurich and two hide-aways in Engadin/St.Moritz and on Lake Como in Italy. All locations are furnished in a charming way with art and antiques. We love to share them with others who have same preferencies and a cultivated life style.
As Swiss host, cleanness especially in times of COVID19 is super important to us. So that our guests feel safe and can relax.

Central and yet quiet location, a little green oasis in the heart of Zurich city. Located in an art nouveau building, totally new renovated in 2012.

if you are 3-4 ppl, then the living room turns into a 2nd bedroom with a luxury french sofa-bed with very comfortable real mattress and cosy duvet, it feels like a real bed.

name: Sofa bed. Quiet, Safe, Clean
description:
Longtime Airbnb host, lots of references! Comfortable sofa bed in private living room. Fast, stable Wifi. Located between airport (15 min) and city center (14 min) direct connection every 9 minutes. Walking distance to Hallenstadion, Oerlikon, Irchel. Host is fully vaccinated againt Covid-19.

The space
You will sleep on a comfortable sofa bed for 2 people (200 x 140 cm) in the private living room of my apartment. In case of 3 or more people I will provide an additional comfortable air mattress (not on the picture) for one or two people. The bed linen is washed and clean. The room has fast and stable wireless internet and enough power plugs. See pictures for more details. Since I have some of my stuff in this room I might need to access it shortly during your stay. Of course I will make sure not to disturb you in any way.

It is not possible to lock the room. Of course the appartment and the house are locked when no one is at home.

The room do
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is situated in a quiet street with low traffic in a residential area that is inhabited by people from middle class. The next shopping place is 500 meters away from the apartment and is open till 8 pm. 2 further shops close by are open till 10 pm. There are several restaurants within the aera of 1 km.
The apartment is very close to the Hallenstadion concert hall and Bahnhof Oerlikon train station (1 km); the Irchel campus of the University of Zurich with its relaxation park and forest is 1.6 km away. Further places within 20 minutes are Swiss Federal Institute of Technology (ETH), Escher Wyss Platz, Langstrasse, city center with old town and main train station.
host_about:
I'm an open minded person who likes to meet new people from all over the world. Having been to more than 40 countries worldwide there is still so much left to see and discover. As an Airbnb host since 2012 I very much like if my Airbnb guests give me an impression of where they are coming from and what their stories are.

With my Airbnb hosting I try to accommodate to my guests needs and wishes but also expect some flexibility from your side since I have a day job and am mostly not at home during the day. But so far we always managed to work something out.

If you make a reservation with me I will give you plenty of ideas about what to do in Zurich before you arrive and am also more than happy to tell you about some hidden spots and local specialties once we meet in person.
Or, if you just want to have a place to sleep, arrive late and leave again early in the morning, that's absolutely fine as well.

description:
The flat is located in vibrant Zurich-Schwamendingen, a typical neighbourhood for locals. It is also close to the forest "Zürichberg" and homesteads, so if you enjoy some green nearby, you are at the right place. 15 mins only to city centre.

The space
The flat is located in vibrant Zurich-Schwamendingen, a typical neighbourhood for locals. It is also close to the forest "Zürichberg" and homesteads, so if you enjoy some green nearby, you are at the right place. 15 mins only to city centre by tram and metro. The flat consists of a big sleeping room, living room and my favourite called library. A well equipped kitchen as well as a bathroom with shower are also available. Not to forget - the balcony with canvas chair and a table with 2 chairs. Charming, bright, cosy and with enough space to live comfortable.
neighborhood_overview: Zurich-Schwamendingen is a non-touristic, vibrant area in Zurich. Locals live here rather normally and according to their own rhythm, the booming and chic Zurich being felt far away yet still in very close reach.
host_about: Nature Lover and hiking affectionate, loves enjoying good food in a place with atmospere, playing Golf and fancying to watch Snooker, no party animal, non-smoker, always a good book at hand.

The space
The apartment has 17m2 and is located on the ground floor. It includes a double bed, wardrobe, kitchen with fridge and stove, bathroom with shower and urinal (an additional toilet is located in the basement), and unique access to the sky lounge on the 19th floor of the building.
PLEASE NOTE that the toilet is located outside the apartment (one floor below the apartment, in the same building, accessible by elevator).

name: Zimmer mit Bad im Herzen Zürichs
description:
In meiner 200 m2 grossen Altbauwohnung mit hohen Räumen und schönen Parkettböden vermiete ich 2 Doppelzimmer mit je einem eigenen Bad. In 10 min zu Fuss erreichbar sind: See,Wald, Oper, das Kunst- und Schauspielhaus, die Uni/ETH, das Unispital.

The space
Die Groesse der Wohnung erlaubt viel Privacy . Ich lebe in alten vintage Möbeln und liebe Stimmungsvolles. Gerne serviere ich gegen Aufpreis ein Frühstück und richte mich auch nach speziellen Essenswünschen. Die Mahlzeit kann auch mit Morgensonne auf dem Balkon genossen werden . Mein Hund freut sich auf Euch . Rauchen ist in der Wohnung und auf dem Balkon nicht gestattet . Ich esse gern vegan und freue mich auf Gleichgesinnte.

Guest access
Mahlzeiten die ich für Euch zubereite werden in meinem grossen Essbereich serviert . Ansonsten sind das meine Privaträume und ich bitte Euch um Respekt . Freies WLAN in der ganzen Wohnung . Jedes Gastzimmer hat ein eigenes Bad. Im Ausnahmefall kann
neighborhood_overview: In unmittelbarer Naehe gibts nette Cafés und Restaurants, feine Lebensmittellaeden und einen huebschen Park. Das Englischviertel ist ein Quartier von gehobenen Lebensstandart, aber nicht versnobt.
host_about:
Sachensucherin und  viel Dingefinderin . Ich liebe die Natur und alles Naturbelassene , Kraftvolle und Energiespendende.. koche gerne und für viele ...mag Menschen und ihre Geschichten ..und die Situationskomik im Alltag .. und Visionen und deren Umsetzung ... 
Zu Eurer Info :   Ich antworte nur noch auf aussagekräftige Profile....bitte ausfüllen   
Mein Haus ist sehr beseelt und darum möchte ich Euch auch kennenlernen .  Danke für Euer Verständnis. 

I am an textildesigner and getting feldenkraispractitioner with an own shop and like things and stories around. i live vegan and most time ecologic . Please send me a fully profil... i like to know more about you before i host you . Thanks alot.

name: Cosy place with spacious terrace
description:
I rent out my place for when I m out of town. It is a small place, fully furnished and equipped. Situated close to the lake (3min to walk) with nearby access to tram, bus and trains.

The space
Small place of about 30sqm (300 sqf) in total plus a terrace of about 15 sqm (150sqm). My apartment is on the elevated ground floor (just 5 steps) and is facing the back court, not the street. The terrace gets sun from late morning till afternoon.
The house was fully renovated a couple of years ago. New bathroom with spacious shower, new kitchen. I have one room that is a combined living and bed room. Attached to the kichen is a corner space with a dinning table.
Coffe and tea will be provided.

Pls note that I live in the city. There is hardly noise from traffic, tram, buses or party goers, but the train line and a church are not too far away...
neighborhood_overview: The quarter of SEEFELD (Kreis 8) is a strech south of the old town that is known and popular for its proximity to Lake Zürich and good restauarants along the main streets.
host_about:
Travel fool. 
Half-marathon runner
Enjoying arts, theatre, opera...
Love exploring new cities, areas and connect with people...

German living in Zurich

name: Shared apt with garden in a very popular area!
description:
This is one of the most popular area of Zurich. People meet here to enjoy their weekends or eating at the hunderts of restaurants around. There is a park next to, where bands play live music in summer time. Clubs, bars, stores are next to. Good for backpackers and single travelers.

Airport: 15 - 20 min by train
Mainstation: 15 min walk or 10 min by pt
Public transport: 1 min walk
Park: 1 min (walk)
Lake: 15 min walk or 10 min by pt
River: 10 min walk or 5 min by pt
Supermarket: 1 min walk

The space
It is a sweet apartment with a garden in the backyard. Nice bedroom, about 15 qm2 with king size bed. You have Wifi in the whoole apt, you can chill in the garden, use the kitchen. Bathroom is shared. TV & DVD and Stereo equipment in the big bedroom.

Guest access
Bedroom, bathroom (shared with me, 2 shrinks), kitchen, living room, backyard
neighborhood_overview: You will live in the city center where all the cultures come together. There are plenty of clubs, bars, restaurants, 24 hours shops right next to you. Young people love this area and the food is very diverse. You will have lots of restaurants and shops right next to the apartment but also the river or the lake are going to be at a walking distance to the flat.
host_about: I am an openminded person, working and studying as a sound engineer. In my spare time, i like to meet people and go for a beer, driving bike or go for a swim in the lake or river. I am also a dj & producer and spend lot of time doing music. If you are uncomplicated and like the nightlife, nature and activities you are at the right place and i can give you all the good recommendations about the city and the "secret locations". Especially during summer there are lots of small music festivals, which you would not find without any help. Looking forward to meet you :)

name: Quiet Room in Penthouse Kreis 7
description:
Cozy and sunny single bedroom in a 3-bedroom apartment with a shared kitchen, bathroom with a bathtub/shower incl. toilet and one separate guest toilet, as well as a shared living/dining room and a spacious balcony.

The apartment is situated in a quiet area where you might find a lot of nature and all of the necessary stores just minutes away.

At the same time there is a bus stop down the road that takes you straight to the city centre within 15 mins and train station within 20 mins.

The space
The apartment is shared with a maximum 2-3 other people that are usually swiss or very international. All residents are mostly professionals between 20-50 y/o, tolerant and respectful - which is what we look out for.

The space has a fully equipped kitchen, a large bathroom with a bath tub/shower, toilet and two sinks, and a small bathroom with a sink and a toilet. There is a big living/dining room, where you can sit together and enjoy a me
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in a very quiet neighbourhood. It is beautiful with nature but not far away from the city centre. Ideal to calm down after a stressful day. It is on the Zurichberg which is the mountain or hill that it is on and if you take a little walk around the area you might get a view over the Zurich Lake.
host_about:
Hungarian/Swiss

I am a mother of three girls, a wife and passionate host. I am in love with the idea of travelling the world. It is the most beautiful way to broaden minds. Excited and always open to meet new people from all over the world.

name: Bed. Private, Clean, Safe, Quiet
description:
Longtime Airbnb host, lots of references! Comfortable bed in private room. Fast, stable Wifi. Located between airport (15 min) and city center (14 min) direct connection every 9 minutes. Walking distance to Hallenstadion, Oerlikon, Irchel. Host fully vaccinated against Covid-19.

The space
You will sleep on a comfortable bed for two people (200 x 140 cm) in a private room of my apartment. The bed linen is washed and clean. The room has fast and stable wireless internet as well as enough power plugs.

It is not possible to lock the room. Of course the appartment and the house are locked when no one is at home.

The room does not confirm to Swiss Covid-19 quarantine regulations.

Other than this bedroom, the kitchen and the bathroom there are two additional rooms: one is my bedroom, the other one is the living room.
The living room is also on Airbnb. It is therefore possible that there will be other Airbnb guests in other rooms dur
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is situated in a quiet street with low traffic in a residential area that is inhabited by people from middle class. The next shopping place is 500 meters away from the apartment and is open till 8 pm. 2 further shops close by are open till 10 pm. There are several restaurants within the aera of 1 km.
The apartment is very close to the Hallenstadion concert hall and Bahnhof Oerlikon train station (1 km); the Irchel campus of the University of Zurich with its relaxation park and forest is 1.6 km away. Further places within 20 minutes are Swiss Federal Institute of Technology (ETH), Escher Wyss Platz, Langstrasse, city center with old town and main train station.
host_about:
I'm an open minded person who likes to meet new people from all over the world. Having been to more than 40 countries worldwide there is still so much left to see and discover. As an Airbnb host since 2012 I very much like if my Airbnb guests give me an impression of where they are coming from and what their stories are.

With my Airbnb hosting I try to accommodate to my guests needs and wishes but also expect some flexibility from your side since I have a day job and am mostly not at home during the day. But so far we always managed to work something out.

If you make a reservation with me I will give you plenty of ideas about what to do in Zurich before you arrive and am also more than happy to tell you about some hidden spots and local specialties once we meet in person.
Or, if you just want to have a place to sleep, arrive late and leave again early in the morning, that's absolutely fine as well.

name: Stylish & modern appartment with large terrace
description:
Enjoy your stay in Zurich in this modern apartment with designer furniture & a large terrace facing the south with views of the local mountain "Üetliberg".

Located between Zürich Hardbrücke & Zürich Altstetten, right next to a shopping mall, you can reach almost every place in zurich within 20mins by public transport or bike. Nightlife areas Hardbrücke & Langstrasse are 5-10mins away by bus, scooter, uber or 15-30mins by foot. The airport can be reached within 30mins by public transport.

The space
You'll be staying in my private 2.5 rooms (66m2) apartment while I'm traveling. It is not a commercial apartment but a unique & personal space that I expect you to treat like your own home.

Get comfortable on the large couch or the danish design armchair and read a book, watch a movie via chromecast on the 55'' TV or play some videogames on the PS4. For a third guest or if you don't want to share a bed, I can provide bed sheets, cover & cushion f
neighborhood_overview:
Zurich-West – From Industrial Quarter to Trendy District

The district in the west of Zurich is full of contrasts, boasting an unpolished charm.

Where ships were once built and engines bolted together, art, design, food, culture shopping and architecture are now the center of attention. Factories have moved away, leaving their vast expanses of space that creative minds have taken advantage of.

Beneath the railway arches, design boutiques and market halls have moved in at what's know as "Im Viadukt" – and on the Gerolds-Areal you find Frau Gerolds Garten (Mrs. Gerold's Garden), a city garden and catering establishment. Besides the Freitag Flagship Store, diverse second hand furniture stores are also on the spot. On the other side of the Hardbrücke (bridge) the 126m Prime Tower reigns – boasting number-one place as Switzerland's highest building until the opening of the Roche Towers in Basel.

Cozy room in a calm apartment excellently located just a few steps from the city centre. Great airport connection. In the apartment there is a full-sized kitchen with a coffee machine. You'll also get a mobile-hotspot to have internet while exploring the city.

Please check the detailed description below to know more.

The space
You are renting a room in a three-rooms apartment. The room has a true bed (which can be expanded to queen-size bed), a table and wardrobe, so you'll have enough space to store all your luggage.

The room is perfect for a single traveller and can also suit a couple after opening the bed.

To make your stay easier for you, there will be waiting for you:
* Internet in the apartment
* Mobile Wifi Hotspot - so you can have constant internet connection while travelling, with battery lasting whole day
* Coffee machine with wide variety of coffee capsules
* EU -> Swiss converter for your electrica
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the second row of buildings, giving a quiet, cosy atmosphere.
host_about:
Hey there! My name is Michał and I've been living and working in beautiful Zürich for almost six years. I like travelling and meeting new people. I have Airbnb experience both as a guest and a host - and still finding every new visit as an opportunity to learn.

If you have any questions, write to me. I'll be happy to answer!
Michał

name: Stauffacher Apartment- Inler
description:
The Zürich Stauffacher Inler – Apartment is a beautiful and newly furnished 2.5-room apartment (32m2) in Zurich. It offers one bedroom with a queen size bed and a living room with an extra sofa bed for two.

The space
There is also a seating area with a table and a fully equipped kitchen. And of course the apartment is equipped with a bathroom with a shower. The washing facilities are located in the basement and included in the price. There is free WiFi access in the business apartment and also a flat screen television is available. The Zürich Stauffacher Inler-Apartment is close to the centre, fully equipped and has an excellent price-performance ratio. This modern apartment leaves nothing left to be desired.
neighborhood_overview: The charming and modern business apartment boasts an excellent location in Zurich. The apartment is located next to the “Bäckeranlage” park and is still close to the heart of Zurich. The famous shopping areas like the Bahnhofstrasse or the old town "Niederdorf" with its many shops and restaurants are only a few minutes away by tram. The apartment is directly accessible by public transport. The nearest tram station "Helevetiaplatz" is only 150m away – from which you have direct connections to the lake and the famous “Bahnhofstrasse”. The main station in Zurich can be reached in about 12 minutes by tram or bus. There are Supermarkets in the direct vicinity. The “Denner” and “Coop” supermarkets are only 100m away.

description:

The space
you are in the very center of Zürichs old town. perfect location to explore Zürich by your own.

access to the floor where your room is located, all non smoking rooms
bar, ground floor

neighborhood_overview: Our house, built in 1879, stands in the middle of the old town of Zurich, in the pedestrian zone. you have many shops, museums, restaurants, bars in the immediate vicinity. everything your heart desires. Zurich main station is only a 7 minute walk.
host_about:
am Hirschenplatz, mitten in der Altstadt findest du uns - und das nur grad  7 Minuten vom Hauptbahnhof entfernt. Nice but wait... What’s their most important thing in life? Easy to answer: their 3-legged dog called Mooch!

The room is currently only available for a monthly rent for students or someone who's coming to start working.

Please ask me first before booking. Sometimes the person living there wants to prolong his or her stay.

The space
The room is for one person only. It is a bright room with 2 views. This part of the old town is very calm (if you ignore the church bells) and it feels almost like being in a village to wake up here.

Guest access
You will have access to High Speed Internet and the kitchen (to share with another guest).

Other things to note
It is very important that my guests don't smoke or bring their little furry best friends. The room is for 1 person only.
neighborhood_overview: This location is great. It has lots of history and so many cute narrow streets.
host_about: I do not have any specific hobby/ies but I like to do and have done many things. I can't tell what I am good in. I never do things that I dislike. I am very satisfied with my desicions. Most of them are very spontaneous. I think I am the funniest person I know....that's enough for me as I rarely find a borring moment being alone. I don't know if my friends think the same of me as not everybody understand my jokes :).

name: Ein Platz an der Sonne
description:
Absolute Top Lage in Zürich. The Top ist eine extrem sonnige Maisonette Wohnung von ca. 180m2. Die drei grossen Schlafzimmer (alle mit Box-Spring Betten) bieten bequem Platz für 6 Reisende. 1 Zimmer mit Etagenbett (80cm breit) und kl. Balkon. Mit 3 Badezimmern (2 mit Dusche/WC, 1 x Badewanne/WC) fehlt es den Gästen an nichts. Das Obergeschoss besteht aus dem Wohn/Essbereich, Bad plus einer Terrasse. Sehr grosse Küche mit allem Komfort! 2 TV's, WLAN, WM und Tumbler. 1 PP ist im Preis inbegriffen.

The space
Top Lage. Zürichsee, Bahnhofstrasse, Schiffsstation, Oper und Bahnhof und Tramstation in unmittelbarer Nähe. Direkter Zugang zum Apartment mit dem Fahrstuhl. Obergeschoss mit Cheminée, Sofagruppe für 6 Personen, Küche mit Frühstücksbar (4 Barstühle) und einem grossen Esstisch für 8 Personen. Die angrenzende Terrasse mit Barbecue lädt zum verweilen im Freien ein. Das Bad (Dusche/WC) befindet sich gleich neben der Küche.
Die Küche ist Top ausgestattet.
<
neighborhood_overview: Das Zürcher Seefeldquartier ist eine Top Adresse. Der Zürichsee sowie diverse Parks bieten viel Platz für sportliche Aktivitäten oder für erholsame Stunden. Für Kinder gibt es viele Spielplätze in nächster Nähe. Badeanstalten und Freibäder sind entweder zu Fuss oder mit dem ÖV erreichbar.
host_about: I like cooking, traveling, kite surfing, staying with friends and meeting people from all over the world.

name: Charming flat in hip & vibrant area
description:
In Zurich (Kreis 5), the area with the highest quality of urban life, in walking distance to the train station, the Landesmuseum, Old Town and the famous shopping street.
The house is a listed building in a save neighbourhood.

[!!!] PLEASE NOTE:
This apartment is on the 4TH FLOOR of the house (NO ELEVATOR!).

The space
The apartment is located in the city center.
With a 5 minutes walk you'll find the apartment from the central station or the national museum, with its beautiful park.
When crossing the river (Limmat) you can pay a visit to the old town and the university district (ETH and University of Zurich).
Further along the famous shopping street Bahnhofstrasse, with all exclusive shops, you get to the lake of Zurich with a stunning view of the alps.
Following the street, where the apartment is located, to the Langstrasse, (about 5min on foot) you'll find yourself in the popular Zurich's nightlife scene.

T
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a very popular area for young locals.
The area allows tourists to get insight into the local scene.

Around the corner you'll find Zurich's best Schawarma or just the best paninis - on which the locals swear. There's also COOP (7am-9pm) and an ALDI around the corner.
host_about:
Born in Incheon (Korea) and living in Zurich for thirty years now.
I'm married and have three adult daughters (27, 24, 23).

We have two apartments on AirBnB:
One of the apartments is on the 1st and the other on the 4th floor of the same house.

The space
Sie haben die Möglichkeit ein frisch renoviertes und geschmackvoll möbliertes Schmuckstück zu mieten. Top Ausgestattet bietet Ihnen die Wohnung alles, was Sie für einen urbanen Lebensstil brauchen. Ob Geschirrspüler, Bügeleisen oder Waschmaschine... Alles ist vorhanden.

Situated on the ground floor of our house, this self contained flat has been tastefully decorated with great attention to detail. Children are very welcome with high chair, baby cot and toys all available on request. Our aim is to make our guests feel as at home as possible.

Guest access
The house is surrounded by a beautiful, wild garden with a private balcony for our guests to enjoy with direct access into the garden. A washer and tumbler are available in a dedicated wash room located in the cellar and can be used upon agreement.

Other things to note
For stays of more
neighborhood_overview: The accommodation is located in Wiedikon which has the best bars, restaurants and independent boutiques the city has to offer right on your door step.
host_about: We are Petra and Simon. Our roots are in both Denmark and Switzerland. We have been living in our house in Zurich with our two daughters – Frida (12) and Asta (7) for the past 10 years. The house was built in 1895 and has been carefully renovated by us over the past years. Petra is a Graphic Designer and Art Historian and Simon is an Engineer. We love Art and Design, music, cooking, gardening, the mountains and opening our door to friends and guests…

neighborhood_overview: The charming and modern business apartment boasts an excellent location in Zurich. The apartment is located next to the “Bäckeranlage” park and is still close to the heart of Zurich. The famous shopping areas like the Bahnhofstrasse or the old town "Niederdorf" with its many shops and restaurants are only a few minutes away by tram. The apartment is directly accessible by public transport. The nearest tram station "Helevetiaplatz" is only 150m away – from which you have direct connections to the lake and the famous “Bahnhofstrasse”. Während meiner Abwesenheit vermiete ein grosses Schlafzimmer und ein Wohn-/Arbeitszimmer mit direktem Ausgang zum Südbalkon, sowie die Wohnküche und das Bad. Die Wohnung ist einfach aber sehr gemütlich, mit grossem Südbalkon, 10-15 Minuten zum Hauptbahnhof. Parks, Kunst und Kultur ganz in der Nähe. Das Bett besteht aus zwei Tatamis mit einem neuen weichen Futon. Die Lage ist ruhig und doch zentral, die Umgebung grün. Ich vermiete nur an eine Person, gerne auch für länger bis Frühling 2022.

neighborhood_overview:
The district 12, Schwamendingen, comprises the three quarters:
- Saatlen,
- Schwamendingen-Center and
- Hirzenbach.

Typical of our city district is, compared to the rest of the city, the particularly large green areas, the extremely active club life, and the large number of co-operative appartements.
The latter were created especially in the 1950s and offer increasingly sought-after low-cost housing. Because of their age, many cooperatives are in the process of modernizing their housing stock during these years. Not only because of building replacements or renovations, but also through new developments such as the Hunziker Areal. The owners along the highway expect the upcoming motorway housing an additional increase in attractiveness for their properties. The motorway separating today the district will connect the two quarters Saatlen and Schwamendingen center after completion of the enclosure and offer the population with the Ueberlandpark an attractive
host_about: Hallo Airbnb Community, Wir sind ein junges paar ferienbegeisterter Weltenbummler und freuen uns über neue Bekanntschaften rund um den Globus. Wir empfangen gerne Gäste und geben Ihnen Tipps aus erster Hand. Genau so sind wir gerne unterwegs und erkunden die Welt.

Kleines Studio, 25qm in der Stadt Zürich ganz für Dich allein! Nur 3 min zu Fuss zum Albisriederplatz, Station für Tram 2 + 3 /Bus, Lebensmittelläden/Migros Restaurants, Bars, Bäckereien. .

neighborhood_overview:
Am Albisriederplatz gibt es Tram- und Buslinien, die in alle Richtungen fahren, sowie auch an den Flughafen (Hardbrücke S-Bahn).
Wir vermieten einen Aussenparkplatz gerade neben dem Haus CHF 8.-/ Tag. Gib uns Bescheid, dann können wir für Dich reservieren, wir brauchen Kennschildnummer und Automarke .
In der Nähe an der Bienenstrasse gibt es ein öffentliches Parkfeld, die Dauer ist 15 Stunden, der Parkplätze sind kostenpflichtig. Das Crowne Plaza hat eine Tiefgarage mit Parkplätzen zum Mieten.

wohne und arbeite schon seit immer in der Stadt Zürich.

name: Ruhige, charmante Wohnung nähe Stadtzentrum
description:
Die charmante Wohnung verfügt über eine kleine Küche, ein Bad mit Badewanne und Duscheinrichtung sowie ein allrounder Schlafzimmer mit Tisch, Sofa, Whiteboard und TV.

Es ist eine ruhige Nachbarschaft und man ist schnell überall dank den super naheliegenden Tram-, Bus- sowie Zugstationen.

P.S. Normalerweise lebe ich in der Wohnung und das sieht man auch. Die Wohnung wird vor und nach jedem Besuch gereinigt.

Bei Fragen helfe ich gerne weiter.

The space
Für einmal einen gemütlichen Abend zu Hause finden Sie im Schlafzimmer einen TV mit einer PS3 und diverse Spiele und Filme, welche Sie natürlich uneingeschränkt benützen dürfen.

Falls Sie mehr der Bücherwurm sind, habe ich auch eine kleine Bibliothek oder ein Whiteboard wo Sie ihre Kreativität freien Lauf lassen können. :)

Guest access
ganze Wohnung
neighborhood_overview:
Zusätzlich ist die Zughaltestelle für auf den Uetliberg in 7 Minuten zu Fuß erreichbar. Auf dem Uetliberg genießen Sie eine wunderschöne Aussicht über die ganze Stadt Zürich, sehr empfehlenswert.

Wenn Sie Eislaufen lieben, eine Eislaufhalle befindet sich in unmittelbarer Umgebung. Im Sommer verfügt die Eishalle über ein Schwimmbad im Freien.
host_about: Ich bin ein junger aufgestellter Typ, der das Reisen liebt. In meiner Freizeit mache ich viel Sport  und geniesse einen gesunden Lebensstil. Viel unternehme ich etwas mit Kollegen.

name: Stylish apartment in trendy Kreis 5
description:
In the heart of Kreis 5, the trendiest neighborhood of Zurich.
Next to the hippest restaurants, bars and design shops and at the same time very calm. The apartment is in a walking distance to the train station (walk: 10 min/tram: 2 min), Old Town and Viadukt. Supermarket 100m away.
The Limmatriver is 100m distance, perfect for running or for a walk.
Beautiful apartment, comfortable and very bright, it is on the 4th floor, without lift.
We will be very happy to welcome you in our cozy apartment!

The space
Our apartment is in the fourth floor so it is really bright. From the sleeping room you can see the Prime Tower of Zürich. The apartment has two sites, one to the street and the other one to the Courtyard, so it´s really bright during the whole day. Even if we are so central located, the apartment is really calm and in spring and summer you can enjoy the sound of the birds.
neighborhood_overview: We love our Neighborhood!! Specially in Summer you feel like on holidays since you are next to the Limmatriver. We love to go swimming after work and drinking some beers in the bars close to the river. Being so well located is a great advantage to enjoy the city, there are great cafes, where you can have breakfast, very nice restaurants with terraces and shops.
host_about:
I am a spanish architect living in Zürich for the last 4 years. I grow up in San Sebastian, Spain and I lived in different cities in Europe. I travelled all over the world and for me is important to feel at home when I am back.
Now my home is in Zürich and I love this city, specially in Summer!
I enjoy having guests in my apartment and making them feeling happy! If you have any questions regarding the apartment, the city or maybe about architecture in Zürich don't hesitate to contact me.

name: Home Away from Home
description:
Are you looking for warm and inviting home to live in Zurich short-term or long-term? Here is a highly functional, yet beautiful and inviting place to live only 10 minutes from city center or main train station (HB). Tram #13 right out front. River and forest only 10 minute walk. Groceries across street. Great location for anyone to stay in the heart of Zurich. Available short-term or long-term. Monthly discounted 10%. Super high speed Internet for home office working.

The space
Attention to detail to the quality and taste of the decor for beauty and comfort, including live indoor plants, antiques, a private sun deck/balcony with fresh herbs, roses, morning glories, bee hives. Room comes with plenty of storage and wardrobe in hallway to hang clothes. High speed Internet and utilities all included.

Guest access
You have full access to the kitchen if you want to prepare your own meals. Laundry room with washer and dryer is avai
neighborhood_overview: Charming neighborhood called "Wipkingen".  Very close to city center, but very green with lots of trees and gardens.  Excellent location for a walk along the Limmat river or a jog through the nearby forest with parkour training course and wood chip-covered jogging track.  My place is close to restaurants, groceries, night life and public transportation.   You can enjoy a fully equipped gym across the river with indoor pool and sauna for a drop in fee of only ~$30/day.
host_about: A professional woman enjoying the cosmopolitan city of Zurich.  Born and raised in California.  Now married to a Suisse and loving it here in beautiful Switzerland.

name: Bright & Stylish 1BR - Near Google HQ & Center
description:
This comfortable 1 Bedroom apartment is on the 2nd floor of newly renovated building located in a central, residential area of Zürich.
Wether you are travelling alone, for business or for vacations, this apartment will be perfect for a maximum group of 4 people.
Located in Wiedikon, Zürich. It is just 10 minutes to the vibrant city centre of Zürich and Google HQ. Packed with lots of restaurants and shops, the lake is just a few minutes away!
Feel free to contact us if you have any questions :)

The space
When you enter the apartment, you will find a fully equipped kitchen and a dinning table for you to share a nice meal after a day discovering the city.
On your left, you will find a bedroom with a comfortable double bed and an attached bathroom.
On your right, you will find a bright living room with a comfortable sofa bed and flat screen TV.
Cleaning service can be provided during your stay.
Hairdryer, TV, iron, ironing board
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is quiet and very safe even at late night. You will find local supermarkets and small grocery shops, and nice bars and restaurants on the adjacent streets as well as a major shopping center (“Sihlcity”).

As hospitality professionals experts, we are dedicated to provide superior customer service with attentiveness to inquiries and our guests while they are staying with us.

Gäste haben ein privates Schlafzimmer mit Doppelbett für sich.

Beautiful, quiet and comfortable 2 room apartment with balcony and own kitchen. The house has 8 parties and a shared washing machine with a washing schedule. Around the corner is a shopping area (Letzipark). Also the Stadion (Stadion Letzigrund) is just a quick walk far away.

name: Privates Zimmer mit eigenes Bad und Balkon
description:
Das Zimmer ist herrlich mit Sicht auf grüne Terrasse mit eigener Dusche. Wir haben eine liebevolle Katze. Wir freuen uns euch willkommen zu heissen. Vom Flughafen nehmen Sie Zug Richtung Hauptbahnhof und steigen aus bei Bahnhof Oerlikon. Von dort Bus 61 Richtung Mühlacker nehmen und beim Station Aspholz aussteigen. Die Haltestelle befindet sich direkt neben unserem Haus. Es gibt Sportplatz und regelmässige Verbindung zum Zentrum Zürichs. 10 min zu Fuss vom uns können Sie baden im Katzensee.

The space
Es ist ein grosses Wohnraum mit offener Küche und grosszügiger zweiter Terrasse

Guest access
Terrasse, Wohnraum, Küche, Dusche

Other things to note
Wir haben eine ältere Katzedame
neighborhood_overview: Neu gebaute Wohnüberbauung, sehr international, jung und cool
host_about:
Moreno und ich sind Familienmenschen. Wir freuen uns euch ein warmes Aufenthalt zu bitten: eigenes Zimmer und eigenes Bad. Wir sind jung und weltoffen, sehr hilfsbereich und respektieren jede Kultur und euere Privatsphäre.
Wir sehen euch als Freunde und freuen uns euch Tips zu geben wenn ihr braucht über Zürich und Schweiz. Da wir sehr gerne kochen gibt es in unsere Küche alles was ein Koch sich erträumen kann an Utensilien. Wir arbeiten beide und kommen am Abend Nachause. Ja, es freut uns euch begrüssen zu dürfen und euch als Gäste bei uns zu haben!

name: Romantic garden view, calm & stylish
description:
Whether you are travelling alone, as a couple or on a businesstrip - you will love our newly renovated studios on the third floor of our villa. They are all spacious (30 m2). Each of them has a separate bathroom. They have very comfortable kingsize bed, a fridge, a coffeemachine, a water kettle and a table where you can work with high-speed internet. In the hallway you will find a microwave, dishwasher, a washer/dryer and a printer/scanner/copy machine. Non-smoking - no kitchen facility.

The space
The spacious Studio (30 m2) offers a unique view on the gardens of our green and quiet neighborhood. The furniture is made of wood - especially made by Swiss carpenters for us. Good design and swiss or at least european materials are very important for us. The bed is very comfortable - you will sleep very well in it.

Guest access
We will give a an access code you can choose yourself. You don't need any key for the studio.

Other thin
neighborhood_overview: Our villa is situated on the lower Zurichberg - a very quiet and green area that you reach very easily by public transport (15 minutes from the main station).
host_about:
Mein Motto ist "Savoir-vivre" - bewusster Genuss!
Ich grille gerne auf meinem Big Green Egg BBQ Grill - dem besten Smoker der Welt! Ich reise gerne, liebe die Natur und den Kontakt zu netten Locals auf der ganzen Welt. Segeln, skifahren, velofahren, Hunde, reiten sind meine Hobbies, die ich gerne mit meinen Freunden und meiner Familie pflege.

name: Suite in Private Apartment near Zurich Bellevue
description:
In meiner Wohnung biete ich zwei Zimmer an, die mit einer Schiebetüre verbunden sind, mit Balkon. Ein diskreter Zugang zum eigenen Bad ist gewährleistet. Die Zimmer befinden sich im 4. Geschoss eines kleinen Mehrfamilienhauses mit Lift. Das Haus befindet sich nahe des Zentrums der Stadt und ist bestens mit öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln erreichbar. Zum Seeufer sind es etwa drei Minuten zu Fuss. Lebensmittelläden und Restaurants sind im Umkreis von 100 Metern zu finden.

The space
Die Zimmer sind Teil meiner dreistöckigen Wohnung in den obersten Etagen eines kleinen Mehrfamilienhauses. Alle Etagen sind mit dem Lift erreichbar, nur vom Hauseingang zum Lift führt die Treppe über eine halbe Etage. Küche und Terrasse befinden sich auf den oberen Etagen, sie sind leicht über die Treppe in der Wohnung zu erreichen. Auf der gleichen Etage wie die Zimmer befindet sich mein Arbeitszimmer. Die Gästezimmer sind auf den ruhigen Hof gegen Süden ausgerichtet. Im Hof steht ein gros
neighborhood_overview: Das Haus liegt in einer flachen und dichtbesiedelten Gegend der Stadt. Trotzdem bietet die Unterkunft einen ruhigen Ort, sich aufzuhalten. Gleichzeitig ist der Ort ein kleines Zentrum im Quartier mit Läden, Restaurants und öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln im Umkreis von ein paar Metern. Der See mit Parks ist zu Fuss in drei Minuten erreichbar.
host_about:
Ich bin aus Zürich, selbstständig, reiseerfahren, mehrsprachig, Vater und noch eine Weile lang noch nicht pensioniert, abenteuerlustig. 
Seit über 20 Jahren wohne ich im selben Quartier in Zürich, der Stadt, wo ich Architektur studiert habe. Aufgewachsen bin ich weiter oben am Zürichsee. Gereist bin ich schon auf alle Kontinente, ausser der Antarktis. Interessiert bin ich an Wissenschaften und Kultur. Sport ist nicht mein Antrieb, mach ich ab und zu aber doch.

name: Feeling Home in Zurich
description:
City Breaker aufgepasst: In unserem Apartment sind Sie mittendrin.
Wer Shopping liebt, findet in unmittelbarer Nachbarschaft die berühmte Bahnhofstrasse, aber auch die Zürcher Altstadt mit ihren edlen und originellen Boutiquen und Bars. Getreu dem Motto " klein aber fein - mitten im herzen Zürichs"

Guest access
Das Schlaf-/ Wohnzimmer ist ausgerüstet mit Bett, Sessel, Schreibtisch und TV. Das Badezimmer hat eine geräumige Dusche.
Der Küchenbereich hat eine Delizio-Kaffeemaschine, einen Wasserkocher und einen kleinen Kühlschrank.

Other things to note
Das Gepäck kann leider nicht zwischengelagert werden. Am Hauptbahnhof gibt es für CHF 9.00 pro 24H Schliessfächer, die gross genug sind um einen Koffer darin zu deponieren.
neighborhood_overview: Die Wohnung befindet sich im Herzen der Zürcher Altstadt. Umgeben von tollen Restaurants und Sehenswürdigkeiten.

name: Villa Zurichberg
description:
spacious villa with 7 bedrooms to rent individually or the entire Villa for private gatherings & event within the Zurichberg residential area of Zurich city, embraced by lake & forest view of its green sorroundings & tranquil abode.

The space
There are Seven Bedrooms for individual Bookings with various style, design and Prices to rent or a Full / Entire HOUSE to RENT PRIVATELY. You choose your Booking Request respective of affordable to highest rates per Night.
For an individual Booking for 1 or 2 persons, please fill in exact number of Guests ( children & ages respectively). For Group Bookings of Maximum 10 persons, be it a Business Meeting, Group Workshop or a big Family Event with Accommodation for a night or two, please CONTACT me or Send me here a Message for Request to Group Accommodation Package
Rates. The Suite Room (nr 3) has another price Category than a group Booking. This can be added in an exclusive group Booking of companies and VI
neighborhood_overview: This village is an exclusive-residential area of  the city, district Zürichberg. People are friendly and speaks English besides German, Swiss German and French or Italian. The Location is next to Dolder Forest, The Dolder Grand Hotel, TDG- Golfclub, The Iceskating Club Dolder, Tennis Club, Restaurants, Grocery Shops, FIFA Headquarters&Sonnenberg area, the Zoo, University of Zürich, ETH, Careum, Hospitals and just a few minutes -straight ride to the Shopping quarters of Bahnhofstrasse  and easy 20 minutes to Zürich Airport. The public transportation is very accessible from our street to and from every point of the city.
host_about: My passion is to welcome guests and friends from all over the world and give them the best travel and cultural experience of Switzerland.

name: From NYC to Zurich: Cozy room 10 min from HB
description:
Hallo, a room is available in the heart of Zurich.

The apartment is 5-minutes walking from bus stop Radiostudio (No. 11/32) and 10 minutes from Bucheggplatz (11/15/32/69/72).

The apartment has 3 bedrooms and a living room. I am living with my brother (Medicine Student) and my girlfriend (same room)!

There are a kitchen with dishwasher, a bathroom, a corridor and a balcony.

If you want to explore and see the city, this will be the perfect location for you !

Looking forward to host you :)

The space
Easygoing Student Place. Non-smoking apartment. Spacious room, convenient location, pleasant neighbourhood.

The rented bedroom is 16 m2, facing south-öst with parquet.

We are two Swiss guys aged 28 and 26, sociable who like order and cleanliness.

Guest access
If you are up for a beer we make you discover Zurich by night if you want

Other things to note
neighborhood_overview: We are in between the center and Oerlikon. Near The oerlikon HB too.
host_about:
My name is Francesco. 
MBA grad from California working in New York City and born in Switzerland.
It is a very exciting city to be in as it has a lot to offer. I like to travel, food and sports. My hobby are cars and watches. 

I am a very welcoming host, I like to meet my guests and make sure they are confortable and most importantly I do like to make my guests feel they are at home. 

As a host on Airbnb and traveller I have learned the beauty of hosting people from different parts of the world and provide them with excellent services and very comfortable stay. 

My promise to my guests is: YOU will always have a friend and a good assistant in me if you ever need while you are in New York and after you leave . 

I would like to tell my guest you are welcome to your home away from home. 

Hosting is what I do best, I offer comfort and relaxation, to all our guests and I like to say I have met so many wonderful people during my years of hosting and I am always looking forward to meet more wonderful people and get the pleasure of hosting them. 

My new friendships are one of the biggest reasons why I love to host!

Cheers,
Francesco

There are 2 bedrooms with a queen size bed 160cm x 200cm and a wardrobe for clothes and in the other also a queen size bed and a large desk for your laptop. 110m2 luxury modern well insulated apartment loft style with high ceilings with windows from FLOOR TO CEILINGS ,all around the whole apt ,lots of natural light. It's also located near many international offices and a 10min walk to a nice swimming area in summer. The neighborhood is safe to walk around at all times of the day or night and alone.
