name: Loft-Maisonette in historic industrial building
description:
Bright, very quiet duplex loft in historic industrial building. The apartment is located on the 2nd and 3rd floor of a former "Citroen" garage.On the upper floor is the entrance, a bathroom with shower / WC, an open kitchen with concrete cover and a living room with office corner.
In the lower floor is the bedroom / double bed, bathroom with bath / WC / bidet, an additional single bed under the stairs and a room with WM / TU and a separate exit. Both floors have access with an elevator.

The space
The kitchen is equipped with everything needed for enjoyable cooking: plenty of space, stove with oven, dishwasher, coffee maker, toaster, kettle, fridge, pots, dishes, etc.
A basic set of spices is available.
In the living room is a sofa to relax and a desk with 24 " iMac to use and printer / scanner / copier if you need an office space at home.

Guest access
The apartment is fully available to our guests at their own disposal.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in a former Citroen garage near the Letzigrund Stadium. An outdoor swimming pool designed by Max Frisch can be reached on foot in 5 minutes and the urban center of Zurich with restaurants, clubs, cinemas, etc. is a tram stop away. The tram station " Albisriederplatz" can be reached in 3 minutes on foot. A Migros grocery store is 2 minutes away. The city center can be reached by bicicle, tram or bus within a few minutes.
host_about: Life is a journey. Do not take with too much luggage. Billy Idol

name: N5 Apartment in the heart of Zurich
description:
Enjoy in this charming holiday home an all-round comfort in a prime location!

Small but nice, that's the motto of this cozy and charming holiday apartment in Zurich. In this furnished holiday flat you live in the centre of Zurich in the famous Niederdorf and you can truely experience the lifestyle of Zurich. The furnished holiday home has one room and offers space for a total of three guests. Moreover, the vacation rental features a small kitchen.

The space
In this holiday flat you can cook your homemade dinner with all the necessary kitchen utensils. Of course, the holiday rental has a private bathroom. To complete the comfort the following services are included in the price: wireless internet, television, bedding, towels, additional costs and the final cleaning of the furnished holiday flat.
neighborhood_overview: The charming Niederdorf V-Apartment is located in the same house as the Niederdorf I Apartment and only a few steps from the Limmatquai and also the lake can easily be reached by foot. Located in the vibrant old part of Zurich called “Niederdorf” with its many restaurants and shops, you can find this newly decorated 1-bedroom apartment. For all gourmets this apartment is paradise. In the heart of the old town of Zurich (Niederdorf) is the small but beautiful "Niederdorf III-Apartment ". Here is a restaurant lined up after another. Whether for traditional Swiss dishes like fondue or raclette or any international cuisine, everybody gets his or her money worth.

name: Room2Lakeview
description:
Discover Zurich by getting off the beaten path from the bustle and noise of the town center. With just 15 minutes tramride direct from the central train station, next to Dolder Forest, you'll find this gem, a Cinderella-Vintage room to keep you comfortable and relaxed unto its private Balcony& fabulous Lakeview!

The space
Guests share one Bathroom, large Shower Room & a separate Toilet with 2 persons in the same Level of this room. One spacious Living Room, Breakfast Room and Garden/Teraces. There is a free roam to the entire communal rooms mentioned. The rest are strictly private areas.

Guest access
Garden, Balconies& Living/Breakfast Rooms, KITCHEN for Coffee/Teas/Storage of Fruits&Snacks

Other things to note
Non Smoking Villa
Teraces, Balconies, Garden are accessible to all Guests

name: Executive 3BR Centrally Located + Balcony
description:
Comfortable 3 bedroom apartment, in the city of Zurich, just for you! Only 5 minutes walk to the Albisriederplatz, station for tram / bus, grocery stores, restaurants, bars and bakeries. With the tram no. 3. it is 15 minutes to the central station or city / old town.

The space
The accommodation is ideal for 6-7 persons. Fresh towels and linens are provided and ready for you.
Cleaning service can be provided during your stay.
Refrigerator, coffee maker, as well as crockery and cutlery are available.
Hairdryer, TV, iron, ironing board are provided.

Guest access
Guests will have access to all the amenities on site

Other things to note
Parking is available at the Hotel Crowne Plaza in the underground car park
be hired.
At the Bienenstrasse there is also a parking area for max 15 hours.
neighborhood_overview: The area around the Albisriederplatz is alive, nearby there are many shops (Migros / Coop) and restaurants. Within walking distance of the Letzigrundstadion (0.5 Km). By tram (2 or 3) you are in a few minutes in the city, at the central station (about 15min / 3 km) and in the old town (15 min / 3 km) or at Bellevue / lake (tram 2).
host_about:
Keys'n'Fly - Airbnb Management Solution That Suits You
My name is Marc with Keys'n'Fly Vacation Rentals, a full service property management company based out of Geneva, Switzerland. My team and I strive to make every experience a seamless one, no matter where your trip may take you. As hospitality professionals experts, we are dedicated to provide superior customer service with attentiveness to inquiries and our guests while they are staying with us. 
Our beloved hosts trust us in managing their properties on their behalf and we hope you will trust us with your stay.
Please let us know how we may help you with your next trip.

name: Heart Old Town 2min to river/lake -Downtown Zürich
description:
At the very heart of Zurich old town and city center, right by the iconic river banks and main tram lines, 4min walk from the lake and 10min walk to Paradeplatz and the main train station (Zurich Hauptbahnhof - HB), lies the apartment with a balcony on the courtyard, a large bedroom and a living space that can host a total of 1 to 4 people.

The space
Very center of the picturesque old town, at the center of the city with all public transportations, 4min walk to the lake and 10min walk to Paradeplatz and the main train station.

Sleeping arrangements for 1 to 4 people:
- 1 Double bed in the bedroom for 2 people
- 1 Brand new sofa bed in the living room for 2 people that can either be transformed into a comfortable double bed or 2 independent single beds.

All windows have shutters, allowing to have 100% dark in the room if needed.

Guest access
The entire apartment is available to the guest.
neighborhood_overview: Welcome to the most beautiful area of Zurich: the historical old town at the center of the city and right next to Zurich lake and the business center.
host_about: Lived, studied & worked in France, the USA, Korea, UK and Singapore! Now based in Zurich, Switzerland working in digital strategy while skiing, kite-surfing and traveling the world as much as possible. Can't wait for the next trip!

name: Zimmer mit eigenem Bad / room with own bath
description:
In meiner 200 m2 grossen Altbauwohnung mit hohen Räumen und schönen Parkettböden vermiete ich 2 Doppel mit je einem eigenen Bad .In 10 min zu Fuss erreichbar sind: See,Wald, Oper, das Kunst- und Schauspielhaus, die Uni/ETH, das Unispital.

The space
Die Groesse der Wohnung erlaubt viel Privacy . Ich lebe in alten vintage Möbeln und liebe Stimmungsvolles. Gerne serviere ich gegen Aufpreis ein Frühstück und richte mich auch nach speziellen Wünschen . Es kann auch mit Morgensonne auf dem Balkon genossen werden . Mein Hund freut sich auf Euch . Rauchen ist in der Wohnung und auf dem Balkon nicht gestattet . Ich esse gern vegan und freue mich auf Gleichgesinnte.

Guest access
Mahlzeiten die ich für Euch zubereite werden in meinem grossen Essbereich serviert . Ansonsten sind das meine Privaträume und ich bitte Euch um Respekt . Freies WLAN in der ganzen Wohnung . Jedes Gastzimmer hat ein eigenes Bad. Im Ausnahmefall kann ich 4 schlafzimmer an
neighborhood_overview: In unmittelbarer Naehe gibts nette Cafés und Restaurants, feine Lebensmittellaeden und einen huebschen Park. Das Englischviertel ist ein Quartier von gehobenen Lebensstandart.aber nicht versnobt.
host_about:
Sachensucherin und  viel Dingefinderin . Ich liebe die Natur und alles Naturbelassene , Kraftvolle und Energiespendende.. koche gerne und für viele ...mag Menschen und ihre Geschichten ..und die Situationskomik im Alltag .. und Visionen und deren Umsetzung ... 
Zu Eurer Info :   Ich antworte nur noch auf aussagekräftige Profile....bitte ausfüllen   
Mein Haus ist sehr beseelt und darum möchte ich Euch auch kennenlernen .  Danke für Euer Verständnis. 

I am an textildesigner and getting feldenkraispractitioner with an own shop and like things and stories around. i live vegan and most time ecologic . Please send me a fully profil... i like to know more about you before i host you . Thanks alot.

name: Central Loft w. sauna, garden and private parking
description:
Beautiful, open plan luxury apartment, in a newly reconstructed building that once acted as a showroom, warehouse and repair site for the legendary Citroen model DS - the goddess La Déesse.

The apartment is fully fitted and has everything you need to have a relaxed stay in Zurich.

It is easy to reach by public transport, with two tram and bus stops only a 5 minute walk away. For those coming by car, a dedicated parking spot is available in the garage.

The space
The apartment is top-modern, with free 1 Gbps Wifi, Sonos speaker, a Samsung "The Frame" TV, with Apple TV, Netflix App (so you can use your own settings) and Zattoo Premium installed, a fully equipped kitchen, comfortable beds (the 200x90 cm bunk beds are also suited for adults) and a travel crib as well as a Stokke Tripp-Trapp and children's chair (Ikea Antilop).

Guests have free access to coffee and tea - a Nespresso machine and milk foam maker are at your disposal.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in Zurich's third district ("Kreis 3, Alt-Wiedikon).

Kreis 3 lies to the south west of the city centre and is bordered by the river Sihl and parts of the Albis mountain range. It comprises Sihlfeld, Alt-Wiedikon and Friesenberg and is overlooked by Bühlkirche and behind this, Zurich’s “very own mountain” Uetliberg. Wiedikon became part of the city of Zürich in 1893 and it is now home to around 47,000 people.

Today, the district is mostly residential. If you wander through the streets of Kreis 3 (which I highly recommend) you’ll find numerous green spaces filled with picnicking families and school children, as well as a large number of antique stores, with some vintage clothing shops thrown in as well.

Wiedikon is home to a number of authentic and very satisfying Asian restaurants. You can find Vietnamese, Thai, Chinese, Indian and Japanese food. Mexican and Spanish cuisine is also available, as well as perennial Swiss, Italian
host_about: Hi, my name is Harm. I am a father of three wonderful kids, love to travel, love technology, love architecture, love art and design,  love fine food and wine, love skiing, hiking and other outdoor activities, love meeting interesting people across the globe.

name: Old rose Studio with a lovely view over Zurich
description:
Exklusive möbliertes Studio
Das Studio wurde 2018 vollständig saniert. Es liegt am Fusse des Uetlibergs, mit einer Traumaussicht auf die Stadt Zürich und ist gut erreichbar.

-komplett möbliert
-voll ausgestattete Kochnische mit Glaskeramik, Mikrowelle, kompl. Geschirr etc.
-eigenes Bad (Dusche/WC)
-Bettwäsche und Frottéewäsche
-Internetzugang inkl.
-Eigener Briefkasten
-Waschmaschine und Tumbler (Cash Card) im Tiefparterre
-Lift vorhanden
-Kostenloser Parkplatz vorhanden

The space
Die Einrichtung ist mit viel Liebe zum Detail gestaltet. Der Eingangsbereich ist mit einer Garderobe und Einbauschränken ausgestattet – wer gerne Ordnung hat, ist hier gut bedient. Kochnische, Essbereich und Wohnraum sind gegeneinander offen und vermitteln grosszügige Gastlichkeit.

Zusätzlicher Komfort der Studios / Appartements:

Küchenzeile: voll ausgerüstete Kochnische mit Essecke, Glaskeramikherd, Arbeitspl
neighborhood_overview:
Das Studio befindet sich am Fusse des Uetlibergs in einem Naturerholungsgebiet. Ideal um nach der Arbeit oder der Stadterkundung ab zu schalten. Joggen, Wandern, Reiten - alles ist möglich. In Gehdistanz befindet sich eine Wellnessoase. Das Spa Center verfügt über Massagen, Innen- wie auch Aussenpool, Kosmetikangebote wie auch Fitness.

Ebenfalls in der Nähe ist ein Freibad bzw. Im Winter eine grosse Eislaufanlage.

Mit der Nahegelegenen S-Bahn kann man auf den Uetliberg, den Hausberg von Zürich, fahren. Von dort oben sehen Sie über die ganze Stadt und den Zürichsee. Ein Muss für jeden Zürichaufenthalt.
host_about:
Wir sind auf die Vermietung von möblierten Wohnungen in Zürich spezialisiert. Personen und Firmen die eine möblierte Wohnung zwecks Geschäftsreise, Urlaub oder Übersiedlung suchen sind bei uns an der richtigen Adresse. 
Auf Wunsch bieten wir Ihnen auch einen Taxiservice von und zum Flughafen an. 

We are specialises in the rental of furnished apartments in Zurich. Our company is specialised in clients making businesstrips, holidays or relocating.  On request we offer a pickup service from and to the Airport.

name: moderne Unterkunft im lebhaften Stadtzentrum
description:
Meine Unterkunft ist mitten im Zentrum zwischen der Tramstation Stauffacher und Bhf. Wiedikon. Du wirst meine Unterkunft lieben weil der Hauptbahnhof, die Innenstadt, der See sowie die Shoppingstrasse (Bahnhofstrasse) in Gehdistanz von rund 10min liegen. Sie ist für Paare, Freunde und Geschäftsreisende sehr gut geeignet.

The space
Wir haben zwei Katzen daher wünschen wir uns auch Tierliebende Besucher. Du wirst dich schnell in der Wohnung wohlfühlen, alles vorfinden was Sie für den alltäglichen Gebrauch benötigen sowie eine sehr gut ausgestattete Küche für schnelle Gerichte bis aufwändige Kochexperimente vorfinden. Das Bett lässt sich zu einem Doppelbett als auch als zwei Einzelbetten herrichten. Wir helfen gerne weiter mit Tipps und Tricks für einen tollen Aufenthalt!

Guest access
Wir wohnen selbst in dieser Wohnung. Das Wohnzimmer, Küche, 2 Balkone und Bad stehen einem selbstverständlich zur Mitbenutzung zur Verfügung.

Other
neighborhood_overview: Meine Nachbarschaft ist ruhig und lebhaft zu gleich. Es hat zahlreiche Restaurants und Cafes in Fussnähe. Mit den Nachbarn im Haus herrscht ein gutes Klima, welches auf gegenseitiger Toleranz aber auch Rücksicht basiert. Ein gemeinschaftliches Denken wünschen wir auch von dir =)
host_about:
Personal Description
Beny and I are peacefully, open minded, uncomplicated persons. We like the adventure and to explore the world, love traveling and to face up with new culture and make friends. We have a lot of energy that we like to share with people. Oh and one of us is pretty sarcastic but I can stop it if someone doesn't like it ;)

Interests
Love to try new food all over the world. 
Love to improve languages and learn new things. 
Love having parties and long nights, make friends and try new drinks especially beer.

name: Lovely room in the most charming flat in Zürich :)
description:
You are renting my bedroom in our charming big, bright apartment, where I live with my flat mate Janine (31 years old). We are very easygoing and happy to host people. The lovely apartment is located very central and public transport as tram, bus or train are just right there. We have several grocery stores nearby and also nightlife is happening just next door. With public transport, we are about 10min away from Zurich main station, 8min from Zurich airport by train.

The space
Our apartment is a place where everyone just should feel welcome and at home.

For people who are sensitive to noise: Please be aware that there‘s a street right next to the house, so it might be a bit noisy sleeping with the window open.
neighborhood_overview: There are a few awesome things to do right nearby. Go for a cafe at Viadukt, you will find nice little shops there too. Some local brands of clothing, food and drinks. Have dinner at "Les Halles". It has an awesome atmosphere. If you are into live music, you should definitely check out Helsinki Club. It's my favourite place in Zurich. Great people & Music. If you are generally into live music, let us know, we have some great tipps. (You might get a discount at our place, if you are a musician ;))
host_about:
Illustrator and graphic designer from Zurich, Switzerland.
www(.)katrin(.)cool

name: A Jewel! Countryside vineyard setting in the city.
description:
In host's maisonette, cosy bedroom with private bath/shower downstairs. Host has upstairs loft separated by door. Beautiful 60sqm living space (full of light, high ceilings, parquet floors, ) may be shared with host who's out most of the day – living room and full kitchen. Easy public transportation at doorstep to downtown and A/P. 15min walk to the lake, train stations. Close to ZH hospitals for patient family member, or Drs and med students attending conferences. Near Arena for yoga workshops.

The space
Private, quiet, tasteful. Country house groove right in city. Trees, gardens and vineyard views surround. Originally built in the 1700s, full of character and charm, tastefully renovated, all modern conveniences. Small bedroom with single bed, private bathroom. Host has separate loft on second floor. Door separates floors for privacy. Gracious garden shared. Downstairs living area happily shared too.

Guest access
Stairs lead up to maisonet
neighborhood_overview: This is an exclusive but friendly neighborhood full of amazing 5min walks to astonishing views over the lake and the alps. The bus stopping on the corner is a dream transportation-wise. Locally famous classic Swiss restaurant at corner,  best fondue restaurant 10-minute uber-ride away. So proximity to the lake means lovely summer days. So close to trains means interesting travel. Close to many hospitals, being in a beautiful environment means a nice place to be when concerned about a patient.
host_about: Originally an east coast American educated in Fine Arts at Columbia and Carnegie Mellon Universities. I've lived in Zurich for 33 years - because it's wonderful here. I've worked as an art director in design agencies for years, but instead of a cold modern interior, I've created a warm, relaxed ambiance. I love leaving work in city life to nest in this special "country house" right by a vineyard. I also wanted to create a gentle ambiance for raising my 2 children, now adult. I grew up with a creek in my PA garden. The trees and creek, birds and creatures outside my place harken back to those pastoral childhood days. People feel instantly at home, safe and relaxed here. It's especially cozy in winter. You will find a lot of good books in English and have great Netflix TV programs to watch in your preferred language.

name: Modern city flat next to the Botanical Garden
description:
Quiet, modern 3 rooms apartment in middle of trendy Seefeld and only 5min walk to the lake and 5min tram drive to the old town and Bellvue. The apartment is located next to a little creek, that flows between the house and the botanical garden. If you like to walk or to run in nature, you're right here - and still in the middle of Zurich. Follow the creek and end up at Grand Hotel Dolder with a stunning view.

The space
the flat has been completely renovated 3 years ago. The sleeping room (with one queensize bed) and the living room are rooms with doors and can be closed. kitchen and dining room are open and great to hang out in. there's also a little balcony that is accessable from the dining room towards the botanical garden. you can use the garden that is equipped with a grill and table.

Guest access
the apartement is yours during your stay. Only washing machine and tumbler are in the basement, but can be used almost everytime.
neighborhood_overview: Quiet neighbourhood with plenty of paths to walk or run in the nature - just in front of the house. The Höschgasse (Tram stop 2 and 4), where you find restaurants and bars is only 5 min walk. But it's also very close to the lake or to Bellvue, where the old town of Zurich begins and where you find the Opera house, Shopping, Bars and great restaurants..
host_about: Im from Zurich/Switzerland and live/ work part-time in Sarnen. I obviously love to travel. I have my own little communication agency (Website hidden by Airbnb) that allows me to travel or go to my house in Sarnen anytime I want. I like to leave my apartment to guests who appreciate a fully equipped (also with some cool plants) home and a perfect base to explore Zurich.

description:
This lovely antik house is located in a very quiet and exceptionally beautiful street in the favored quarter Enge. To Museum Rietberg with it s beautiful park and lakeview it s just a short hop. It is eight minutes to the lakeside and ten minutes by tram to the mainstation. There is a big shopping center just some minutes apart with an asian spa and some restaurants.
Your guest room in japanese style with tatami mats is part of my simple furnished 4 room apartment where I live with my son.

The space
It has a double bed on tatami mats, a loft bed with two beds and if needed an additional Futon. The room has morning and afternoon sun and there is a key for your door plus access to a loggia.

Guestroom, loggia, hallway, bath, kitchen, balcony

As this is a house with mostly elderly people. Therefore my place is good for hosting families, single travelers, business people or a group of

description:
A modern, colorful 1-bedroom apartment.
There is everything you need.

I‘m offering my apartment as I‘m not very much at home. So you will find some of my private stuff in the apartment, but don’t mind;-)

The space
There is one bedroom with a 160/200m (Boxspring) bed with a night table and a clothing rail. The room has direct access to the beautiful 30m2 balcony.

There is a fully equipped kitchen with a storage room, where you can find a washing machine.

The spacious living room with a 6 chair dining table and a huge comfortable sofa.
You’re gonna find a Sony 3-D Bravia TV with Apple TV and Bose sound system in the living room and high speed WiFi in the entire apartment.

There is a 6m2 modern bathroom with shower to share for all guests.

The apartment (Attika) is located on the 6th floor with elevator

Guest access
You will have the whole apartment and the balcony for your

host_about:
Welcome and thank you for stopping by!
I have been in Zürich for 10 years (originally from Cologne, Germany).
I love being a host and enjoy going out of the way to make guests feel at home. I treat everyone like they are my friends or family. I enjoy meeting people from all walks of life and from all over the world and when guests want to hang out whether for 5min for a quick chat or cozy meal on one of their free nights, makes the airbnb experience so much fun.
Whether I host you or you host me, I`ll do my best to make sure we both come out happy;-)

name: charming centrally located apartment
description:
a very bright and charming old building (fully renovated) apartment in the heart of bustling Zurich (close by Helvetiaplatz and a lovely Park)
The apartment ist bright and we like to keep the interior rather minimalistic.

The space
The view from the balcony (to the park) is probably one of the highlights. Also it's within walking distance to a lot of places in the city. A lot of great restaurants, bars and coffee shops are close by our home. It's a newly renovated old building apartment, with a lot of charm.

Guest access
access to one big bedroom, a spacious living room with balcony (park view), a bathroom and the kitchen
neighborhood_overview: Two blocks away from the parc, the night life quarter Langstrasse, the farmers market and a lot of great places. Very easy access to public transportation.
host_about:
That’s us- the Kernens.
A Swiss family of four (David, Michelle, Lee and Jim). 
We love our tiny apartment in the heart of Zurich, but also appreciate our mountain home in Laax a lot. 
When not working you can find us at a coffee shop, being active outside (we love sports). We are also interested in interior design and visiting other cities (such as Barçelona, which is one of our favorites). 

Our homes are kept minimalistic and eco friendly. 

David runs his own heating and sanitary company.
Michelle works part time as social media manager for a local coffee roastery, runs her own blog (since 2014) and keeps the boys busy and entertained.

We have hosted a lot of people before having kids (in Zurich and Los Angeles) and now would love to share both of our apartments again with interesting people from around the globe. Look it

name: Studio Premium (9912)with Zurich views
description:
Die Stadt Zürich liegt Ihnen zu Füssen. Mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln ist die Innenstadt in max 20 Minuten erreichbar. Die Busstation Zielweg liegt direkt vor der Wohnung. Unsere neuen möblierten Studios (Dezember 2018 gebaut) bestechen durch die funktionale einfache und moderne Einrichtung. WIFI Internet, TV, Nespresso Maschine werden Ihnen einen angenehmen Aufenthalt garantieren.

The space

name: Cosy, centrally located Room
description:
The cosy room is part of a 4,5 room apartment where my partner and I live.
Your room is furnished with a comfortable 1.40 m size bed, a small table with office chair and a place to hang your clothes.
You have an own toilet, but the shower is shared with us. There is a possibility to wash and dry your clothes and you can use our kitchen if you like.
The apartment is very centrally located but in a very quiet neighborhood. With public transport it takes only 15 minutes to the Zürich main station.

The space
I will offer a small breakfast and you can use my coffeemachine or take tea for free.

Guest access
You will have your own room and your own toilet , but share the bathroom, kitchen and living room with us.

Other things to note
The place is quiet but close to Escher-Wyss place, Hardbrücke and the city center.

There is a Publibike bike rental station 190 m away from the apartment.
neighborhood_overview:
Our apartment is based on the first floor in a quiet neighbourhood, but very close to bus/tram stops, small convenience shops and 15 mins away from the mainstation.
The river limmat is only 10 minutes walk away and perfect to go jogging. For more sports you can go up the hill for 20 minutes where you find a Vitaparcours (sports parcours) in the forest.

Wipkingen is a part of Zürich that changes more and more into a hip place. I recommend a typical Swiss brunch at "Kafi Schnaps" or "Restaurant Nordbrücke".

Just on the other side of the river you find the new emerging "Zürich West" with many bars, clubs, restaurants and the Prime Tower (tallest building of Zürich with restaurant/lounge on the top).
host_about:
In a previous job I was called 'The Holiday-Queen' because before holidays was after holidays. I love planning for travelling and exploring - mainly Asian countries.

At home, I just started a company and am interested in Co-Working Spaces and the Zurich startup scene.

description:
Kleines süsses Zimmer im Erdgeschoss des romantischen alten Hauses. Das Haus befindet sich 1 Minute von der Bahnstation, 9 Minuten bis zum Hauptbahnhof und 15 Minuten hinauf zum Uetliberg, dem schönsten Aussichtsplatz von Zürich. 5 Min. bis zum Tram 14, Bus 33 und 80.

The space
Wohnraum

Vor unserem Haus liegt die Stadt zu unseren Füssen und hinter dem Haus befindet sich eine Wiese, gleich anschliessend der Wald. Wichtig: Die Räumlichkeiten sind sehr einfach und im Vorraum und Badebereich hat es einen Betonboden. Du musst alte, einfache Häuser lieben, darum der günstige Preis!!! Neben dem Zimmer befindet sich das Badezimmer (mit Bad und Dusche sowie Waschmaschine), welches wir im Haus alle gemeinsam benutzen. neighborhood_overview: Wir haben sehr nette Nachbarn.....die im Notfall sicher euch Auskunft geben können.

name: Spacious apartment in Zurich's District 4
description:
Lovely and bright apartment in the heart of Zurich. Perfect for business travelers or city visitors as it is located right in the city center in the famous area of Kreis 4 directly behind the main station. 70sqm give you the opportunity to stay in a nice and modern place with many of the best restaurants and bars Zurich has to offer around.

The space
Not only is the apartment perfectly located, lovely and modern decorated it is also prepared with love and attention to detail to insure every guest feels welcome and right at home!

It includes the following
- Elevator
- double bed
- couch and TV (Netflix)
- working area with desk, chair and laptop holder
- dining table for up to 4 people
- fully equipped kitchen
- breakfast table for two
- small bathroom with shower, toilette and towels
neighborhood_overview:
District 4 it’s Zurich’s most cosmopolitan and multi-cultural district, perfect for bar-hopping and with options for partying. It offers a great variety of posh to low key bars and restaurants and the most known Langestrasse around the corner.

Even though the district is very lively, the apartment ensures a cozy and quiet environment as it is located offside the buzz.

name: Homeoffice Stadtwohnung mit Parkplatz und Balkon
description:
Charmante Wohnung "TURICUM" - mit Balkon und inklusive Parkplatz auf Privatgrundstück! Sie ist für Ferienreisende, wie aber auch Geschäftsleute bestens geeignet. In 8 Minuten sind Sie im Stadtzentrum oder in 20 Minuten am Flughafen Zürich Kloten. Dennoch liegt die Wohnung an einer sehr ruhigen Lage, nahe bei diversen Erholungsgebieten.
Bitte beachten Sie auch meine zweite Wohnung "Helvetia" im selben Haus.

The space
Diese charmante Wohnung haben Sie für sich allein und ist der perfekte Host um Zürich; sogar die gesamte Schweiz zu erkunden. Die Unterkunft liegt im trendigen Quartier Wipkingen, an einer sehr ruhigen Strasse. Bus- sowie Tramstationen sind in 2 Minuten zu Fuss zu erreichen. Von dort sind es nur ein paar weitere Minuten bis ins Stadtzentrum. Vom Flughafen kommend sind es 7 Minuten Fahrzeit mit der S-Bahn und nur zwei Haltestellen bis zum Bahnhof Wipkingen. Nicht nur das Nachtleben, Konzerte und Veranstaltungen jeglicher Art sind schnell zu erreic
neighborhood_overview: Einkaufsmöglichkeiten sind in ein paar Minuten zu Fuss zu erreichen. Verschiedene Restaurants sind in der Nähe und die beste Aussicht auf Zürich geniesst man vom Restaurant "DIE WAID", das in ein paar Gehminuten erreichbar ist. Diverse Unterlagen,  Reiseführer und Vorschläge liegen in der Wohnung auf. Sehr gerne helfe ich auch persönlich bei der Ausflugsplanung.
host_about:
Das Reisen und das damit verbundene Kennenlernen von Menschen unterschiedlichster Kulturen ist eine meiner Leidenschaften.
Mein Credo fürs Leben: Die Bereitschaft jeden Tag dazu zu lernen, Ehre und Respekt. Genau so versuche ich als Gast und als Gastgeber zu sein.

name: Fairy-Tale Apartment next to the Opera & Bellevue
description:
Cosy apartment with wooden roof elements. An oasis of tranquility in the middle of the city. Walking distance to the lake of Zurich and the Opera.
Caution: Although the site is free of traffic noise, the nearby church bells might be an annoyance. Please read details beneath (section “Other things to note”)

The space
The entire apartment is at your disposal. It’s charm is due to the self made renovation it has gone through 2016.

Most of the interiors are either handmade originals (especially the 2.60 meter long pear wood table as well as the paintings and the sculptures) or catches at second hand stores.

The Japanese made classical guitar may be used for playing music. Please handle with care.

Guest access
You may take the small tables and the small stools (one round, one rectangular, both with bamboo or yarn) in front of the house. Please, take them in again when leaving.

If needed, you may use the wash
neighborhood_overview:
The neighbourhood is not as busy as other parts of Zurich but is as near as it gets to the city and many sightseeing highlights.

Being situated in a courtyard, the house is surrounded almost entirely by taller buildings which keep you safe of any traffic noise coming from the streets. Nevertheless, daylight is never short because the west front of the house is facing an open space that separates the house from the St. Anton Church.
host_about: Teacher, olive oil producer and music lover trying to keep the work-life balance in good shape all over the year while cooking for friends, travelling to distant and near places and having interesting discussions with people.

name: Sunny & Quiet Apartment, 20min from City center
description:
We offer a very nice, sunny and modern apartment in Zurich, inside a 3 family house recently renovated. It's on a very quiet location in a blind street at the golden coast of Zurich (Witikon). The bus stop that leads from and to the main station (Zurich HB) is 250m away. ALDI, Denner & Migros supermarkets are 280m away in a shopping mall and if you like jogging or nature, the forest it's at the end of the street.

The space
The apartment was recently renovated, we have a modern induction kitchen and a bathroom with a Geberit toiled/bidet plus a jacuzzi type bathtub for your enjoinment. There are two balconies, one looking forward to the lake and the other at the back of the kitchen. We have king beds(180x200cm) in all rooms and one of them can be split to become two single beds according to your requirements (please ask beforehand). There is a fully equipped kitchen at your disposal. The living room has a smart TV, also a dining table for 6 persons.
neighborhood_overview:
We are in Witikon one of the most exclusive neighbourhoods in Zurich at the east side of the Lake, better known as the Golden Coast, because the sun reaches all year long. Close we have the Zurich Zoo and the Dolder Bath & Ice Skating. The woods are just at the end of the street and three supermarkets (ALDI, Migros and Denner) are on a shopping mall 280 meters away from the house.

The east side of the lake offers several distractions if you like art and culture, close is The Kunsthaus (Art Museum), The Bellerive Museum, The Tram Museum, The Corbusier House, The China Garden, the Opera House and of course many spots at the lake where you can take a swim or go for a picnic in summer.
host_about: We are Jürg and Valeria, we like to travel a around the world and know very well what are the amenities everybody seeks on vacation rental. We like to pay attention to details and try our best to keep the apartments clean and tidy for our guests. We are looking forward to be your host and give you a pleasant stay.

name: 2 Ihr WG-Stadtzimmer mit Garten
description:
Das möblierte Stadtzimmer mit 16m2 überzeugt mit seiner optimalen Lage im Zentrum von Zürich Oerlikon. Die Messe, Hallenstadion, Theater 11, ETH, die Universität sowie alle wichtigen Touristenattraktionen wie das Niederdorf, der Zürichsee, die bekannte Bahnhofstrasse sind mit dem Zug oder dem Tram 10, 11 oder 14 innerhalb von wenigen Minuten erreichbar. Den Flughafen erreichen Sie mit dem Tram 10. Die Tramhaltestelle "Salersteig" ist nur wenige Meter vom Zimmer entfernt. Velounterstand vorhanden

The space
Die neue Küche, WC/Bad wird gemeinsam genutzt.
Es besteht die Möglichkeit im Keller seine Wäsche ohne Gebühr zu waschen. Das Waschmittel muss aber selbst mitgebracht werden.

Die Mieter sind für die Reinigung der gemeinsamen Räume selbst verantwortlich.

Guest access
Gemeinsamer Garten zum Erholen. Zum Grillen bitte fragen.
neighborhood_overview: Die Liegenschaft befindet sich in unmittelbarer Nähe verschiedenster Einkaufsgeschäfte. Die Uni ist mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmittel in nur wenigen Minuten erreichbar. Ein Wald in der Nähe lädt neben unserem Garten ebenfalls zum Entspannen ein.
host_about: Hi, ich bin Christa, Mutter 3er Kinder und 3er Enkelkinder. Ich vermiete 3 WG-Zimmer in einer EG-Wohnung im Herzen ZH Örlikon. Ich selbst wohne in Zürich, ca 20Min von der Wohnung entfernt. Ich liebe Tiere und arbeite grösstenteils von zuhause aus als Schneiderin. Ich liebe Tiere und hüte von Zeit zu Zeit beide grossen Hunde meines Sohnes. Auf dem Bild seht Ihr meine jüngste Tochter mit meinem Enkelkind. Sie ist mir bei Arbnb Arbeiten, insbesondere beim Übersetzen und Überwachen der Termine behilflich.

name: Central sunny Maisonette
description:
Absolute Top Lage in Zürich. The Top ist eine extrem sonnige Maisonette Wohnung. Die zwei riesigen Schlafzimmer (beide mit Box-Spring Betten) bieten bequem Platz für 4Reisende. Mi t2 Badezimmern (1 mit Dusche/WC, 1 x Badewanne/WC) fehlt es den Gästen an nichts. Das Obergeschoss besteht aus dem Wohn/Essbereich, Bad plus einer Terrasse. Sehr grosse Küche mit allem Komfort! 2 TV's, WLAN, WM und Tumbler. 1 PP ist im Preis inbegriffen.

The space
Top Lage. Zürichsee, Bahnhofstrasse, Schiffsstation, Oper und Bahnhof und Tramstation in unmittelbarer Nähe. Direkter Zugang zum Apartment mit dem Fahrstuhl. Obergeschoss mit Cheminée, Sofagruppe für 6 Personen, Küche mit Frühstücksbar (4 Barstühle) und einem grossen Esstisch für 8 Personen. Die angrenzende Terrasse mit Barbecue lädt zum verweilen im Freien ein. Das Bad (Dusche/WC) befindet sich gleich neben der Küche.
Die Küche ist Top ausgestattet.

Guest access
Der Fahrstuhl fährt direkt ins unter
neighborhood_overview: Das Zürcher Seefeldquartier ist eine Top Adresse. Der Zürichsee sowie diverse Parks bieten viel Platz für sportliche Aktivitäten oder für erholsame Stunden. Für Kinder gibt es viele Spielplätze in nächster Nähe. Badeanstalten und Freibäder sind entweder zu Fuss oder mit dem ÖV erreichbar.
host_about: I like cooking, traveling, kite surfing, staying with friends and meeting people from all over the world.

name: Beautiful Business Apartment Zurich City
description:
The apartment is in a top district near Zurich Airport 12min and to Zurich city 10min with the car.
The Loft provides accommodation with amenitiens such as free Portable WIFI and a Beamer.

The apartment comes with 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwascher and a dining area, and a bathroom.

The space
The Space!
Locaded on the outkirts of Zurich, 100m from edge of the forest, 12min to the City of Zurich
very good connection to public transport bus 32 and the train s6.
Parking is available (20swiss francs) per night (must reserve it before)
Supermarket (Migros, Coop, Spar) is 7min to walk.

Interation with the guest.
I am always available during the day and you are very welcome.

name: Villa Allegra Studio - Bohemian chic in Zurich
description:
Located half way above Zurich in the mansions district, Villa Allegra is an old lady build in 1907 in a typical Swiss mountain chalet style. It’s situated, not far from the city center by foot, public transport or taxi and yet set in beautiful natural green surroundings with open views. The studio with about 30 sqm of space is available to you with a kitchenette, that can host up to 2 adults. The house is divided in 3 units and 2 are offered in AirBnB.

The space
This villa has its own charm and definitely is one of a kind. Living in almost the heart of the city but still be in a chalet-like home is pure luxury.

The studio apartment with small cooking facility and a big bathroom is on the garden level. It has its own patio outside with a table to enjoy your meals. It fits two persons on 30 sqm

Guest access
The garden area in front of the house and the pergola are private and not shared with guests of the Airbnb.

Othe
neighborhood_overview: My personal tips and guide is set up for you to see in my profile. Many known places for sure some secrets coming from me as a local Zurich habitant. But nevertheless this location is very close to the lake and Bellevue, as it is a jump away from the university campus and ETH. Zurich is a little big city, but for main sightseeing you are quite fast everywhere in town. My favorite around the corner the Bohemia Restaurant at the Kreuzplatz!
host_about:
We are are a young family of four, two school-girls, my husband, me and three bunnies named Frida, Sugar & Armstrong .

We love to travel ourselves and enjoy being adventures and learning about new things, cultures and habits while we are abroad. Biggest love is Paris and New York; Tel Aviv has been a regular and can't be missed at least once a year, the food is divine! Actually bohemian-chic and boutique hotels are the places you would find us most. We appreciate the special gems around the globe.

At our home we are happy to share any inside tips with our guests, but of course are respecting the privacy of your stay. For that reason we're also expecting the privat area of ours to be valued.

My husband and I own a film production company and work with our team from the villa. Our big passion is film, has been always and still fascinates us every day. 

Cooking and hosting is another big love of mine, but the biggest is my family, for me I enjoy having quality time with them. Lucky us, the family even expands to a great group of dear friends, so our life is blessed with lot's of good energy and fine people.

Since we acquired the villa a few years ago, another joy finds its way into our environment; I absolutely love to decorate and interior design spaces. In little steps we've been renovating the house, giving it back it's old beauty. Amazing how it's changing step by step. Sharing it with guests is great. 

I am so curious about life and who we are in ourselves, I love the journey day by day!

2BR is a lovely charming 3 room apartment with about 70 sqm of space available that can host up to 4 adults. It has a fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher. A table at the entrance with a patio can be used.

The space
The apartment has two bedrooms that each hold double beds, the beds can be separated and rearranged. One of the bedrooms which is bigger, hold two lounge seats and a TV with Apple TV Box incl. Netflix. Please be aware, that there is not a separate living room situation. You will find hang out room within the big bedroom or the live-in kitchen.

A big well equipped kitchen with a table for four together with a bath room with tub and sho
neighborhood_overview:
It is one of the exclusive residential area of Zurich called the "Sonnenberg" (sunny hill) overlooking the city.

A 15 minutes walk will take you to Bellevue, the lake and downtown.

Going up the hill will take you very fast to the lovely city forest and a great view point to even get a better view of our city.

Other then that, around us many old houses, a church nearby - kind of secluded but still in the middle of it. Please be aware, it is a city after all - not New York with crazy noise but not Zen-Silence like in the wilderness either!

name: Downtown Exclusive 2-BR Apartment with Terrace
description:
Just less than 1 km from Bahnhofstrasse and a 12-minute walk from Paradeplatz and featuring free WiFi, this newly refurbished 2BR apartment is centrally located and well connected by public transport.

Charming & safe neighbourhood, with restaurants, bars, swiss bakery, shops and supermarkets all closeby. The apartment has an unblocked view to the park and enjoys full privacy.

A spacious 40 sq. m outdoor terrace (very rare in the city centre) with dining table for 8 & two sun beds awaits you.

The space
The apartment is ideal for up to 5 persons - a double bed plus a sofa bed in the master bedroom and 2 single beds in the second bedroom.

The apartment is modern and comfortable for a family, a couple, group of friends, or business traveller.

Kitchen is fully equipped with dishwasher, oven, refrigerator, Nespresso coffee maker, electric kettle, microwave, toaster, cooking utensils and a full set of cutlery and plates.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is just round the corner from Stauffacher, and close to Zurich’s vibrant central district. Surrounded by restaurants, shops and services, this neighbourhood is safe and has plenty to offer.

With many popular restaurants just right next door (Samurai II Japanese, Mythos Greek, Molino Italian, Le Cedre Lebanese, St. Jakob Bakery & Café etc.) and a mini supermarket just one minute walk away, you are well served in the area.

For those who like to keep active, NON STOP GYM is right across the road and Hallenbad City Indoor Swimming Pool is within five minutes of the apartment, while nearby Kasernenareal Park is perfect for a lunchtime stroll.

And if you’re keen to soak up some culture, the Kantonspolizei Zürich Kriminalmuseum and Haus Konstruktiv modern art museum are all a short walk away.
host_about: Hi there! I am working in real estate & hospitality businesses and enjoy meeting new people from all over the world. Our company COSMPOPOLITAN APARTMENTS is offering serviced apartments with style. Looking for a fab place to stay? You've found it! :-)

name: Le Bijou Bahnhofstrasse / Paradeplatz LB18A
description:
Located in the heart of Zurich at the famous Bahnhofstrasse next to the Fraumünster Church and Paradeplatz, Le Bijou presents a Swiss masterpiece in hospitality: Le Bijou Bahnhofstrasse / Paradeplatz Apartment. This is a self check in type of property. There is no reception and no staff on site. You check in by yourself with your personal door code which will be sent to you by James. The apartment is in a residential building so you can immerse yourself into the local Zurich city living.

Other things to note
There is a Sauna inside the apartment which the guests can use.
neighborhood_overview: Switzerland’s biggest city is more than an impressive financial centre. Start the day by walking through the Niederdorf to explore the small streets, lined with shops and historic buildings. Indulge in retail therapy on Zurich’s most famous shopping street, Bahnhofstrasse which is right on your door step.

description:
Cozy and sunny single bedroom (bed 140x200cm) in a non-smoking 3-bedroom apartment. The apartment is situated in the top apartment in a quiet and good living area where you might find a lot of nature (f.e. to go jogging) and a great choice of stores just minutes away. At the same time there is a bus stop down the road that takes you straight to the city centre within 15 mins and main train station within 20 mins from early morning till after midnight. There is even a Nightbus on weekends.

The space
The apartment is shared with a maximum of 2-3 other people with Swiss or international origine, english speaking is fine. All residents are mostly professionals between 25-40 y/o, tolerant and respectful - which is what we look out for.

name: Spacious and stylish apartment in a very hip area
description:
This is a homey, clean, quiet apartment in a friendly and very trendy quarter in Zürich. Ideally for two to four people, the flat is a modern 3 room apartment and only 1 min away from one of the most beautiful public squares in Zurich: the Idaplatz.

The master bedroom is next to the quiet courtyard in the back of the building.
The elegant light furnished and light-flooted rooms are all 3m high. The kitchen and living room are modern, charming and very spacious with attached balconies.

The space
The apartment is situated in one of the most trendy quarters of Zurich only 10min from HB with public transport.

Nearyby you will find hip coffees, bars and restaurants. The supermarket, bakery and organic shop are in walking distance.

The nightlife of Zurich is in only 15min walking distance.

For a nice hike we recommend the close mountain Uetliberg, which you reach with public transport in only 10min.

name: Tiny studio in Zürich near to the Lake
description:
The flat is a renovated studio located in a 19th century house. The living room area includes a sofa a small table and a double bed.
Other two spaces are available, a kitchenette fully furnished and a bathroom with bathtub.

A bus station located in front of the house.
Tram / Train station 8min walk.

10 min walk / In this area is possible to swim at the lake around Badi Mythenquai and visit the Cultural Center Rote Fabrik with his restaurant on the lake.

Guest access
You can have access to the all surface of the studio, the flat is meant for your own use.
The kitchen is furnished and there is a refrigerator if you need it.

Other things to note
A boiler system warm the water for the house, to be sure to get hot water don't forget to activate the boiler at night time (a button is located in the kitchen, more instruction are given at the check in time).
neighborhood_overview:
The small flat is located in a quiet and green area of the city.
Walking around in the Wollishofen district is not unusual to encounter elegant villas, and historical houses. The lake is just 10 minutes walk distance from the house and in summer the many restaurant and bars facing the lake, the beach at Mythenquai and his green surrounding really worths a visit.
host_about:
The city is beautiful and worth a stop, the lake, the nature surrounding, the small cafés, the many cultural and recreational activities, Zürich has much to offer! 

I love to host people, and I am used to host friends spent time together and organize dinner-  it's a must do! 
My house is tiny but well organized, charming and welcoming. 
It's perfect for friends and couples visiting the city. 

About myself: 

I'm a freelance professional active in the art and cultural field, traveling is part of my life. 
I moved in Zürich in 2018 where I am currently based. 

I work with in theaters, art galleries and museums. Therefore I am happy to advice you about recent cultural happenings in the city. I have many friends all over the world, that's why it's not unusual to meet me with my luggage on the road! 

Let me know about yourself, I am here to help you organise your trip and glad to answer your questions. I speak IT / FR / ENG / DE

Warmly,

Giulia

The space
I live by myself and I am happy to welcome you to my home!
* You will have a big room available for you with a bed and wardrobe for your use.

My apartment is located in the city zone of Zurich (Wollishofen), few minutes walk to the lake and either bus or tram to take you straight to the main shopping street. Even though those are not far, my apartment is surrounded by green fields and a quiet street.

Just a few minutes away there is small Migros grocery's and bigger Aldi and Coop. Pharmacy and more stores are close by.

name: Large Fully Equipped Room - Zurich
description:
Large (16.5 sqm) and well-equipped room, designed for business travellers, located in the city of Zurich.
Much care and attention has gone into design of the room to provide guests with a number of key facilities to allow for a comfortable stay. In addition, the location of accommodation provides excellent travel links to reach a number of key destinations.
Given how well equipped the room is, it also provides an excellent platform for a tourist who wants to visit the city at the weekend.

The space
Room Specification
- Literature provided (not to be removed from the property); Monocle guide to Zurich, Latest edition of Monocle magazine, city map, key contact numbers
- 3 Seater green chesterfield sofa
- Cork notice board
- Desk organiser complete with basic office stationery (Pens, post it note and ruler)
- Desk lamp
- 39 inch/ 100 cm Panasonic HDTV
- HDMI cable to link your own media device to the HDTV
- Goog

- 3 minutes walk to the number 3 tram stop, which stops at; Zurich Main Station and a number of other great eating and drinking destinations in the city (Langstrasee, Wiedikon, Lochergut, Hardbrucke, Letzigrund)
- Number 80 bus which will connect you to Trimelispital, Altstetten Station and Oerlikon
- Number 67 bus which will connect you to Wiedikon (popular night life area)

description:
Well-equipped room (11sqm), designed for business travellers, located in the city of Zurich.
Much care and attention has gone into design of the room to provide guests with a number of key facilities to allow for a comfortable stay. In addition, the location of accommodation provides excellent travel links to reach a number of key destinations.
Given how well equipped the room is, it also provides an excellent platform for a tourist who wants to visit the city at the weekend.

The space
Room Specification
- Work area including desk and chair and additional stool
- 32 inch/ 81 cm LG Smart HDTV – allows you to connect to your favourite media (ie Netflix, youtube, spotify and more)
- HDMI cable to link your own media device to the HDTV
- Superfast fibre optic WiFi
- USB charging sockets
- Fridge
- Ironing board
- 100% Cotton sheets and towels
- Wardrobe with mirrored door
- Lint roller (to remove hairs/dust
neighborhood_overview:
- 3 minutes walk to the number 3 tram stop, which stops at; Zurich Main Station and a number of other great eating and drinking destinations in the city (Langstrasee, Wiedikon, Lochergut, Hardbrucke, Letzigrund)
- Number 80 bus which will connect you to Trimelispital, Altstetten Station and Oerlikon
- Number 67 bus which will connect you to Wiedikon (popular night life area)

name: Bright & quiet room with private bathroom Oerlikon
description:
🅑🅡🅘🅖🅗🅣 🅖🅤🅔🅢🅣 🅡🅞🅞🅜 in our spacious flat in Oerlikon, Zurich. You get your own bathroom with shower to use. Perfect for solo travellers, business travellers or students looking for a clean and friendly place to stay.

Quiet area, yet very close to Zurich: in 20min you are at the Lake & in the old town of Zurich, at Bahnhofstrasse for shopping or at Langstrasse for the vibrating night life with bars.

Free parking space right outside our house.

The space
"𝘌𝘯𝘫𝘰𝘺 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘤𝘰𝘮𝘧𝘰𝘳𝘵 𝘵𝘩𝘢𝘵 𝘢 𝘩𝘰𝘵𝘦𝘭 𝘸𝘰𝘶𝘭𝘥 𝘰𝘧𝘧𝘦𝘳 𝘤𝘰𝘮𝘣𝘪𝘯𝘦𝘥 𝘸𝘪𝘵𝘩 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘸𝘢𝘳𝘮𝘵𝘩 𝘰𝘧 𝘴𝘵𝘢𝘺𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘢𝘵 𝘢 𝘧𝘳𝘪𝘦𝘯𝘥𝘴 𝘱𝘭𝘢𝘤𝘦."

The guest room (13m2) comes with a comfortable 1,20m-Bed with a VERY SOFT mattress and enough storage space for your belongings. Private guest bathroom with a shower and toilet for your personal use.

If there are 2 of you, we can put up a big air mattress (1,20m) for the second person in the same room at CHF 20.- per night.

Guest access
Guests enjoy t
neighborhood_overview:
There is a super market (Migros or Coop) within 10min walking distance and a corner shop less than 5minutes away.

Our accommodation is close to ETH Zurich-​Oerlikon buildings ONA and Octavo (OCT) - literally 5min by foot.

Enjoy the sunset in the summer from the balcony or go for a run in the nearby woods (5min) after work.

You will find an organic farm with fresh milk, dairy and groceries 15mins from our house.

Oerlikon offers lots of restaurants, shops, a huge second-hand shop and public swimming pool.

In 20min you reach the center of Zurich, the lake and the old town.
host_about: Hi, I am Nicole! I have worked in hospitality for over three years and now we are so excited to be able to host people in our own little AirBnB hotel! I live with my boyfriend Livio who studied at ETH and now we are both working. We have a spare room and bathroom that we love to share with travellers from all ages and places. We love good coffee, long walks around our house and good meals in Zurich. On the weekends, we often go hiking or camping around Switzerland. I love to read, so you will also find a selection of books available. We are very happy to share our beautiful country with you!

name: Apartment in the heart of the Old Town
description:
The apartment building is situated in the most ancient part of Zurich Old town, and the heart of the old town. It is calm despite the distance to the shopping street of Bahnhofstrasse. It is a prime neighbourhood with the most attractive hotspots the city can offer. Within only 5 min walk to the main train station, Zurich HB, you can easily take a train and get to all destinations in Switzerland.

The space
The apartment building is from year 1336. It is narrow building and there is no elevator. The building had a major renovation in thirties so many elements are still from that time such as bathtub/shower, kitchen sink, radiators, pipes and doors. You can see the trace of time, wich gives the apartment the charming aspect.
The bathtub is a bit higher than todays standard tubs. The bathroom with a window doesn't have a sink.

Guest access
If you are travelling alone and book the apartment for yourself without the ”extra guest” option. Yo
neighborhood_overview:
There is a multistory car park in the vicinity. The neighbourhood is car free except for the delivery to the shops until noon. Taxis can enter the whole day with a very reduced speed limit.
The tram stop is just down the street and the main train station Zurich HB is 1 stop away or 8 minutes walk distance.
host_about: I do not have any specific hobby/ies but I like to do and have done many things. I can't tell what I am good in. I never do things that I dislike. I am very satisfied with my desicions. Most of them are very spontaneous. I think I am the funniest person I know....that's enough for me as I rarely find a borring moment being alone. I don't know if my friends think the same of me as not everybody understand my jokes :).

name: Grosszügige 1.5 Zimmer Wohnung mit sonnigem Balkon
description:
Diese grosszügige Wohnung mit grossem, sonnigen Balkon befindet sich im Kreis 2. Sowohl das Einkaufszentrum Sihlcity als auch der See sind nur 10 Gehminuten entfernt. Die Nachbarschaft bietet diverse Restaurants, eine Bäckerei sowie einen kleinen Supermarkt. Ein Umfassendes Einkaufs- und Freizeitangebot findet man im Einkaufszentrum Sihlcity.
Öffentliche Verkehrsmittel mit direkter Verbindung ins Zentrum befinden sich in unmittelbarer Nähe und bringen Sie in kurzer Zeit ans gewünschte Ziel!

The space
Das Wohnzimmer bietet eine gemütliches Sofa, einen SMART TV, einen Ess-/Arbeitstisch und auch genügend Platz für ein work-out.
Der Schlafbereich bietet ein komfortables, grosses Bett und diverse Schränke für die Aufbewahrung. Bei schönem Wetter lädt der grosse Balkon zum verweilen ein.

Guest access
Der Waschraum befindet sich im Keller und funktioniert ausschliesslich mit dem elektronischen Waschschlüssel.

Other things
neighborhood_overview:
Die Nachbarschaft bietet unter anderem die grosszügige Allmend, wo man ausgedehnte Spaziergänge oder Joggingrouten entlang des Flusses laufen kann. Hier gibt es auch einen Wanderweg auf den Üetliberg, für diejenigen, die hoch hinaus wollen. Richtung See geht man über den Hügel, wo sich das Museum und der Park Rietberg befinden. Man hat einen tollen Ausblick über den See bis hin zu den Bergen!
Einkäufe erledigen Sie ganz nahe im Sihlcity oder beim kleinen Supermarkt um die Ecke.
Es warten auch diverse Restaurants und Bars, welche sich in 10 Minuten Gehdistanz befinden, Google kennt die genauen Adressen!

name: *9MINUTES FROM ZH MAIN STATION* / *SPACIOUS* / *MODERN* / *SURROUNDED BY RESTAURANTS & COFFEES* (A)
description:
***VIEW NOW IN 360° MODE / COPY THE LINK BELOW***

https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=Pd6xw8XtdAn

A wonderful spacious apartment, well furnished offering all amenities you need during your stay in Zurich for 1-5 guests. A supermarket is located in the same building and the tram stop "hottingerplatz" from where you are just minutes away from "kunsthaus/museum of arts" is litterally in front of the house. Bakeries, coffee, restaurants and pharmacy are across the street. The apartment is located in one of the posh areas of Zurich and surrounded by many old and nice townhouses great for nice walks.

The space
As you enter the house there is a big elevator to get to the apartment. Opening the apartments door you will have a entry area, the dining area and couch/tv area in front of you in an open space. There are big windows and a nice view. A balcony invites for a glas of wine or a cold beer during the warmer month. The bedrooms are in the back fro
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is situated in a wealthy area of Zurich. The apartment is located to the small ancient "village center" which offers all daily supplies you need. On foot you are in "niederdorf/old town zurich" in about 10min/1km). Museums like the museum of art or Kulturama (museum of culture) are in walking distance. Also theaters and the lake of zurich are just a walk away. I strongly recommend to have a walk to Kafi Paradiesli, Hofstrasse 19, 8032 Zürich, a very nice sweet little hidden coffee place with a small but good menu.
host_about:
Hi I'm Alex. I was born in Zurich, studied economics in Berlin and Dubai and am now back in Zurich were I am running a company in the real estate business.  

I like doing sports like tennis, sailing, volley etc but enjoy going out in Zurichs nightlife as well. I would describe myself as very open and spontaneous and love showing people what the city has to offer. 

As son of a family working mainly in the tourism branch i had many chances to visit many countries in the world and get to know a lot of different cultures which i think is very interesting and helpful in life. The good side effect is, that I enjoy showing guest around in Zurich and "share" what our City offers! 

Having into depth discussions suit me as much as going out and having fun.

hope to see you soon.

alex

name: Double Room with shared bathroom in a pop-up hotel
description:
Unser Pop Up Hotel liegt an bester Lage in Zürich, direkt am Limmatquai im Herzen der Zürcher Altstadt. Wir bieten frisch renovierte und möblierte Zimmer mit allem was nötig ist, aber ohne viel Schnickschnack. Die Bäder befinden sich auf der Etage und werden geteilt. In unserem unkomplizierten und familiären Umfeld wirst du herzlich empfangen und dich wohlfühlen.

The space
Das Haus ist bald 500-jährig und liegt gehört zum Denkmal-geschützten Teil der Zürcher Altstadt.

Other things to note
Dieses Inserat ist zur Anfrage eines Langzeitaufenthalts in unserem Hotel (ab 7 Nächte) Bettwäschewechsel und Zwischenreinigungen sind nicht inklusive in den Preisen für Langzeitaufenthalte und können nach Bedarf angefragt werden. Zimmer mit Flusssicht können nicht garantiert werden.
neighborhood_overview: Direkt an der Limmat, 5 Minuten zu Grossmünster, Fraumünster & Wasserkirche/Helmhaus , 2 Minuten zur Predigerkirche, 7 Minuten zum Hauptbahnhof. Diverse Bars und Restaurants in unmittelbarer Nähe.
host_about:
Unique location, directly on Limmatquai in the heart of Zurich's old town. Only 7 minutes by foot to the train station, a tram stop is just outside the building (»Rudolf-Brun-Brücke»). 
The rooms are newly renovated, they all have a sink in the room, toilets and showers are shared.
It's an almost 500-year-old building with a lot of charm. 
***
Einmalige Lage, direkt am Limmatquai im Herzen von Zürich. Nur 7 Gehminuten vom Hauptbahnhof entfernt, Tramhaltestelle »Rudolf-Brun-Brücke» direkt vor dem Haus.
Frisch renovierte und neu eingerichtete Zimmer, alle mit Lavabo im Zimmer, Duschen/Toiletten auf dem Gang. 
Schöner Aufenthaltsraum mit Blick auf die Limmat. Ein 500-jähriges Haus mit viel Charme!

name: grosses helles Architektenzimmer, Golbrunnenplatz
description:
Salute,
ein schönes helles Zimmer ist zu haben. Die Lage ist super, 1' min Gehweg zum Goldbrunnenplatz, Tram 9 geht zum Paradeplatz und Tram 14 - zum Hauptbahnhof; 3' min zum Idaplatz und 5' min Lochergut mit dem Tram 2 (T2) and 3 (T3); all den Strassen mit Bars und Langstrasse. Für 8,-chf am Tag miete ich meinen Fahrrad.
Du hast hier wirklich eine perfekte Mischung aus absoluter Zentralität und Ruhe in der Nacht.

The space
Der Wohnraum ist gross, hell und ist zum Innenhof gerichtet. Damit ist das Zimmer sehr ruhig trotz zentraler Lage. Die Küche und das Bad werden geteilt. Auf dem Balkon in deinem Zimmer hast du Grill und kannst beim schönen Wetter grillieren.

Guest access
Flur, Küche, Badezimmer

name: Lakeside Studio in Zurich Seefeld
description:
Stylishly decorated small studio apartment. Approx. 30sqm, located on a 2nd floor of an old building, only a jump away from the lake of Zurich. Entirely equipped and furnished with vintage furniture, handmade objects, books & artwork. The space has a partial wall-bookshelf or divide and a 200x160cm bed.

Centrally located, perfectly connected to public transport, and situated in Zurich’s popular Seefeld district, on the lakeside.

Good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

The space
A single room that features a kitchen and a bathroom. It is a self-contained unit and houses everything in the single room space except the bathroom, to which is connected through a corridor. The different areas of the single room are employed for varied uses: a corner of the room is used as sleeping area, another corner designed as a kitchen, and the space in between is designed as a living/working room. In addition, the space has a partial wall
neighborhood_overview:
It is only a jump away from the lake of Zurich, next to the train station of “Tiefenbrunnen" and tram station “Wildbachstrasse”, offering perfect connectivity to the Main Train Station as well as the Airport.

Other areas of the city center and the lake of Zurich are only few minutes walk away. Surrounded by numerous restaurants, bars, supermarkets, parks & cafés, the studio is amid one of the most beautiful, hip and vital areas in Zurich.
host_about: Zurich based. Creative Entrepreneur. Art & Design Lover. Fervent traveller.

name: Tiny bright apartment 8 min from Hb Zürich
description:
This beautiful tiny apartment is all yours and has two balconys, so it s very bright from the morning (eastbalcony) to the evening (westbalcony). There is an elevator brining you directly to the entrance door of your floor. It has a sleeping room in japanese style with a king size bed, a living room with lots of space to relax, read and two optional extra beds for familys or travelling groups. It s a beauty of a antik double house in green & yellow with five floors brand new renovated.

The space
It s only 7 min from HB Zürich with S4, 1 min to a nice shopping area with restaurants and cinema and close to the lake side.
neighborhood_overview: The street is quiet with nice colourful houses and just around the corner of Sihlcity, one of Zürichs nicest shopping malls just at the riverside. One of my favourite places is Museum Rietberg with a big park with big old trees and view to the lakeside & swiss mountains just 200 meters away.

name: Single Room with shared bath in a hotel
description:
Unser Pop Up Hotel liegt an bester Lage in Zürich, direkt am Limmatquai im Herzen der Zürcher Altstadt. Wir bieten frisch renovierte und möblierte Zimmer mit allem was nötig ist, aber ohne viel Schnickschnack. Die Bäder befinden sich auf der Etage und werden geteilt. In unserem unkomplizierten und familiären Umfeld wirst du herzlich empfangen und dich wohlfühlen.

The space
Das Haus ist bald 500-jährig und liegt gehört zum Denkmal-geschützten Teil der Zürcher Altstadt.

Other things to note
Dieses Angebot ist zur Anfrage von Langzeitaufenthalten gedacht. Bettwäschewechsel und Zwischenreinigungen sind nicht inkludiert, können aber je nach Bedarf bei uns angefragt werden.
neighborhood_overview: Direkt an der Limmat, 5 Minuten zu Grossmünster, Fraumünster & Wasserkirche/Helmhaus , 2 Minuten zur Predigerkirche, 7 Minuten zum Hauptbahnhof. Diverse Bars und Restaurants in unmittelbarer Nähe.
host_about:
Unique location, directly on Limmatquai in the heart of Zurich's old town. Only 7 minutes by foot to the train station, a tram stop is just outside the building (»Rudolf-Brun-Brücke»). 
The rooms are newly renovated, they all have a sink in the room, toilets and showers are shared.
It's an almost 500-year-old building with a lot of charm. 
***
Einmalige Lage, direkt am Limmatquai im Herzen von Zürich. Nur 7 Gehminuten vom Hauptbahnhof entfernt, Tramhaltestelle »Rudolf-Brun-Brücke» direkt vor dem Haus.
Frisch renovierte und neu eingerichtete Zimmer, alle mit Lavabo im Zimmer, Duschen/Toiletten auf dem Gang. 
Schöner Aufenthaltsraum mit Blick auf die Limmat. Ein 500-jähriges Haus mit viel Charme!

name: Charming Popup Hotel-Double Room (shared bathroom)
description:
Our pop-up hotel is located in the heart of Zurich's Old Town and is giving new life to a hotel in a house which has a 500-years history. All rooms have an individual layout and might vary from what you can see in the pictures. Our double rooms are ideal for travellers who are looking for a central but affordable stay, that offers a glimpse into the history of a temporarily used hotel and are not afraid to share our communal bathrooms with other guests.

The space
The pop up hotel is located in a house with a 500-years history about 100 of which as a hotel. Not everything is perfect but all of it offers a history in it's own uniqueness and charme.

Please note that your room can vary from the pictures as we have decided not to upload pictures of every individual room we have but instead show y

Our personally managed hotel is only five minutes from the central train station, and you can comfortably see the sites by foot, or by public transport. Please note, that we have no restaurant at our hotel. There are many cafés, restaurants and bars just around the corner and we will be happy to help you choose the right one for you.

name: Zimmer im Zentrum von Zürich!
description:
Du hast ein Zimmer mit einem 1.8 x 2 Meter Bett. Die Wohnung hat 6.5 Zimmer, ist also ziemlich gross, hat einen grossen Balkon mit Blick auf das Wahrzeichen des Quartiers, die Kirche Enge. In der Wohnung hat es alles was du brauchst, inklusive Waschmaschine und Tumbler direkt in der Wohnung! Die Tramhaltestelle ist direkt vor der Haustür, von dort aus erreichst du fast alle wichtigen Orte in Zürich in wenigen Minuten, auch den See.

The space
Du teilst dir die Wohnung mit meinen super netten Mitbewohnern, also sei bitte auch nett zu ihnen. Wenn du Tipps und Hilfe von ihnen brauchst, frag sie, sie werden dir gerne helfen. Verlasse die gemeinsamen Räume einfach so, wie du sie angetroffen hast. Sprich nutzt du die Küche, bitte mach sie danach wieder sauber, genau so das Badezimmer.

Guest access
Du hast Zugang zum Wohnzimmer, zur Küche, zum Bad und zum Balkon. Tabu sind eigentlich nur die Zimmer meiner Mitbewohner.
neighborhood_overview: Die Wohnung liegt super Zentral. Es gibt in der direkten Nachbarschaft viele kleine Cafes und Restaurants. Direkt auf der anderen Strassenseite findest du zum Beispiel die gemütliche Bederbar. In wenigen Minuten erreichst du das Zürcher Seebecken, du kannst Abends zum Beispiel für einen Drink ins Seebad Enge um deinen Tag ausklingen zu lassen oder einfach am See entlang spazieren und den Blick in die Alpen geniessen.
host_about:
Hi, I'm Nico. I live in beautyful Switzerland and love to host and meet people and of course also to travel. 

See you soon ;-)

name: *360 TOUR AVAILABLE* *SPACIOUS*5MIN FROM CITY CENTER / 29MIN FROM AIRPORT*QUITE AND NICE NEIGHBOURHOOD*
description:
SEE 360° TOUR OF THE APARTMENT HERE: https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=EHqShRxYy2d

This apartment is situated in a well maintained building in a very good and well connected neighbourhood inside the city of Zurich.

With its three spacious bedrooms and three 160x200 beds, a dining area/living room, kitchen and bathroom and pretty little garden, all equipped with everything you need for a few days in Zurich, it is the perfect base for small groups or for families or business travellers to make the most of their stay without loosing time with commuting. Well-known restaurants, shops and wonderful parks are within walking distance. Step out of the apartment and be anywhere within maximum 15minutes.

The space
Basic but well maintained apartment with very comfortable big beds and fully eqquiped with all you need for your stay in Zurich:

- Coffee Machine
- Full equipped kitchen
- Fresh Towels and linens
- Shampoo / Toile
neighborhood_overview: The area around "hegibachplatz" is know for its calm wonderful neighbourhoods with big old townhouses and many parks, smaller coffees and shops. Yet it is very well connected and offers it self for nice exploration walks to "villa Patumbah", the botanic garden, the lake or the "neumünsteranlage" around the corner. Right next to the apartment you will find the restaurant "Butchers Table" which is well known for its outstanding meat dishes, and the restaurant "Misoga" which offers modern asian fusion kitchen.
host_about:
Hi I'm Alex. I was born in Zurich, studied economics in Berlin and Dubai and am now back in Zurich were I am running a company in the real estate business.  

I like doing sports like tennis, sailing, volley etc but enjoy going out in Zurichs nightlife as well. I would describe myself as very open and spontaneous and love showing people what the city has to offer. 

As son of a family working mainly in the tourism branch i had many chances to visit many countries in the world and get to know a lot of different cultures which i think is very interesting and helpful in life. The good side effect is, that I enjoy showing guest around in Zurich and "share" what our City offers! 

Having into depth discussions suit me as much as going out and having fun.

hope to see you soon.

alex

name: Everything you need to feel at home on 110m2
description:
The stylish apartment (110m2) is situated in the urban area of the 3rd district. The city centre and the lake can be reached within a few minutes by public transport. The elegant shopping centre Sihlcity with numerous shops, restaurants and a cinema is just around the corner. Other restaurants, bars, shopping possibilities, as well as as the Hürlimann spa with a rooftop bath are offered by the direct vicinity. The beautiful local recreation areas Allmend Brunau and Uetliberg are situated nearby.

The space
The light-flooded apartment with high quality materials, modern furnishing and a sunny balcony of 28 m2 creates a unique living experience. You enjoy a spacious living room, a dining corner for 6 persons with an open and large, fully equipped kitchen. The bedroom has also direct access to the balcony and the separate walk-in wardrobe is combined with washing/tumbler machines. Elegant stone tiles in the bathroom, a modern fireplace, art and pictures on the walls
neighborhood_overview: The suburban train station Giesshübel is situated just on its doorstep and brings you in four minutes to the main railway station (the airport Zurich Kloten can be reached in 25 minutes). There are only steps to the closest bus and tram station, while the surrounding traffic arteries can be accessed quickly by a private car.
host_about: I lived in Zurich for many years and worked in an international environment in the city. I enjoyed the time in this great city and I am still often in Zurich. The apartment was my oasis for years. Today I live near Zurich in a house with garden. I love gardening, today I often paint in my own studio and enjoy our three four-legged friends (mainecoon cats).

name: Quiet and bright room, all you need!
description:
Nice and quiet room in the heart of Zurich close to Albisriederplatz in a bright and quiet three room apartement.

The space
The room is part of a cosy old building apartment that has everything you need for your stay. You can feel at home here. The sun shines into the living room, on the comfortable couch you can listen to music and read and relax from your walks in Zurich. We even have a balcony where you can sunbathe. My room faces the backyard, which is green and, except for the birds, quiet like in the countryside.

name: Spacious apartment in "The Metropolitans"
description:
Located within the Oerlikon district of Zurich, the apartment offers two loggias & a garden view. The apartment is in an area where guests can engage in activities such as hiking and cycling. The apartment features a bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen including a dishwasher, an oven and a bathroom with a shower. The new apartment building is 10 minutes away from the airport (train) and another 10 minutes by train to the central station of Zurich.

The space
The apartment is located in the 4th floor and offers a bedroom, a bathroom with a shower, two balconies (south and north), a fully equipped kitchen and dining table.

As I usually live there, my private bedroom will be locked. I only rent this place when I am not there, therefore the apartment is all yours.

The bedroom itself includes a sofa (can be extended to a double bed) and a 140x200cm bed with direct access to the balcony.

Parties are NOT allowed in this building. Please not
neighborhood_overview:
There is gas station with a mini market as well as a super markert right across the street which offers a big section on groceries. There are 2 more supermarkets available within a 5 minutes walk.
The building faces a nice park on the south side which is ideal for some walks.
host_about:
Hi, I’m German, living in Switzerland and love to travel.

name: HELVETIA Homeoffice Stadtwohnung mit Parkplatz!
description:
Charmante 2 1/2 Zimmer Wohnung mit tollem Ausblick über die Stadt, inklusive Parkplatz auf Privatgrundstück. Sie ist für Ferienreisende, wie aber auch Geschäftsleute bestens geeignet. In 8 Minuten sind Sie im Stadtzentrum oder in 20 Minuten am Flughafen Zürich Kloten. Dennoch liegt die Wohnung an einer sehr ruhigen Lage, nahe bei diversen Erholungsgebieten. Bitte beachten Sie auch mein 2. Inserat der "Turicum" im selben Haus.

The space
Diese charmante 2 1/2 Zimmer Wohnung haben Sie für sich allein und ist der perfekte Host um Zürich; sogar die gesamte Schweiz zu erkunden. Die Unterkunft liegt im trendigen Quartier Wipkingen, an einer sehr ruhigen Strasse. Bus- sowie Tramstationen sind in 2 Minuten zu Fuss zu erreichen. Von dort sind es nur ein paar weitere Minuten bis ins Stadtzentrum. Vom Flughafen kommend sind es 7 Minuten Fahrzeit mit der S-Bahn und nur zwei Haltestellen bis zum Bahnhof Wipkingen. Nicht nur das Nachtleben, Konzerte und Veranstaltungen jegliche
neighborhood_overview: Einkaufsmöglichkeiten sind in ein paar Minuten zu Fuss zu erreichen. Verschiedene Restaurants sind in der Nähe und die beste Aussicht auf Zürich geniesst man vom Restaurant "DIE WAID", das in ein paar Gehminuten erreichbar ist. Diverse Unterlagen,  Reiseführer und Vorschläge liegen in der Wohnung auf. Sehr gerne helfe ich auch persönlich bei der Ausflugsplanung.
host_about:
Das Reisen und das damit verbundene Kennenlernen von Menschen unterschiedlichster Kulturen ist eine meiner Leidenschaften.
Mein Credo fürs Leben: Die Bereitschaft jeden Tag dazu zu lernen, Ehre und Respekt. Genau so versuche ich als Gast und als Gastgeber zu sein.
