description:
Ideally located in one of most vibrant neighborhoods of Zurich, full of bars, restaurants and cafes. 5 min walking from Limmat and only few stops by tram from Central Rail Station. It is also possible to reach by foot with a nice walk through a park and long the river.
This place is ideal for positive and fun people who look for a nice experience and not only a place where to sleep in Zurich.

The space
The room is located so that your privacy (and mine) is guaranteed all the time.
It is cozy and bright, equipped with brand new furniture and many books :)

Guest access
We will share the bathroom and common areas (kitchen and living room).

IN SUMMER: If the floating boat is available you can have it along with a water proof bag for only 30chf/day for an AMAZING floating experience on Limmat river!

Other things to note
NOTE FOR EARLY ARRIVALS AND LATE DEPARTURES REQUESTS:
Usually I am very fle
neighborhood_overview:
Everything is within walking distance:
30 seconds to Grocery store
2 min to a beautiful park
4 min to Pharmacy
5 min to Post Office
6 min to Limmat
17 min to Central Rail-station (walking of 6 min by tram)
20 min to City Center
25 min to Lake
host_about:
Hi, my name is Irina but I like when people call me Liuna - the name my dad started calling me since I was little. 

I am so happy and grateful that our paths crossed even if only virtually for now! 


Let me share with you some information about myself. 
I lived in 7 countries and speak 7 languages. 
I cannot live without: traveling, sport (especially yoga and jogging), fruits, flowers and books.

Favorite continent to travel: Asia
Favorite country to live: Italy (but I LOVE Switzerland and especially Zurich where I currently live)
Favorite fruit: mango, but I go crazy about all what is in season. 

You will have a positive, vibrant and bubbly world citizen as host/guest with a lot of travel and life stories to tell (in lots of languages). 
Traveling, meeting new people and sharing life experiences is my biggest passion and I hope yours too. 

Hope to meet you soon and until then stay blessed, healthy and happy! 
Irina

name: Nice & central, lovely terrace over river & park
description:
It's a lovely 2.5 room apartment located in the lively area of Wipkingen with a terrace over the river Limmat and Wipkinger Park.
You can start your morning with a cup of good coffee and get going around by nearby public transportation or by my old bicycle. Great for couples, also with babies/kids (nearby playground and doors with better soundproof system). Great for home-office: a monitor available if requested.

The space
2.5 room apartment: separate bedroom (double bed), living room at the entrance of the apartment, dining area next to the kitchen, sunny balcony; building renovated 6 years ago.

Guest access
Well connected to the city center, pleasant neighborhood at the river: ideal for walks, running or having a dip in the water
neighborhood_overview: Located in a residential area near a community center with various facilities: playground, little zoo,  table tennis facilities, etc. River Limmat just 3 minutes away, perfect for a walk or your run, during the summer you can dip your tired feet in the river on stairs in the Wipkinger park where people hang around. The area gets lively during the day, usually quiet at night. Legendary bookstore/cafe Spheres, few restaurants and bars (Gruental, 26 Rose Garden, Bar Damm, pizzeria San Genaro) are around the corner. Nearest grocery shop 8mins on foot. Just across the river there is the industrial area Hardbruecke with bars, music and jazz clubs (e.g. Moods).
host_about: I am a nature lover, both in the winter and in the summer. I enjoy snowboarding and hiking a lot, getting a break from my happy city life in Zurich. My apartment in Zurich is very central but next to a river and woods. Together with my partner we own a chalet-style studio in Verbier and we'll be happy to share it with you.

name: Naturzimmer
description:
Im 5 Millionen Sterne Hotel bist du weit weg von der Hektik des Alltags und trotzdem nur 30 Minuten vom Stadtzentrum von Zürich entfernt.

Du übernachtest mit Rundumsicht mitten auf einer Waldlichtung und musst trotzdem nicht auf den Komfort eines Zimmers verzichten.

Frühstück ist inklusive und steht am morgen vor dem Naturzimmer bereit. Je nach Wetter könnt ihr es draussen auf der Waldlichtung oder gemütlich im Bett geniessen.

Auf Anfrage bieten wir auch eine Yoga Lektion.

The space
Das wunderschön eingerichtete Zimmer befindet sich auf einer Waldlichtung am Stadtrand von Zürich. Ihr habt die ganze Waldlichtung mit dem Naturzimmer für euch alleine zur Verfügung.

Selbstverständlich steht Holz für das Lagerfeuer zur Verfügung.
neighborhood_overview:
Die Umgebung bietet sich für kürzere und längere Waldspaziergänge an. Unsere Lieblingsroute geht dem Bach entlang, welcher mit einem kurzen Fussmarsch erreichbar ist.

Nach einem 30 minütigen Spaziergang, werden auf diesem Weg auch die beiden empfehlenswerten Restaurants Trichterhausermühle oder Steakhouse Fleisch am Chnoche erreicht.
host_about:
Geschichte Naturzimmer
Vor ein paar Jahren hat Lukas in einem Bubble Hotel in La Réunion übernachtet und war vom Erlebnis begeistert. Er hat dann zusammen mit Iwan an der Umsetzung eines solchen Projekts in der Region Zürich gearbeitet. Die beiden haben einen Weg gefunden, wie man ein Angebot gestalten könnte, waren nach erstem Standort-Misserfolg nur noch auf der Suche nach einem geeignetem Plätzchen. Durch einen glücklichen Zufall sind sie dann auf Corinne aufmerksam geworden, welche nicht nur einen wunderschönen Standort zu bieten hatte, sondern mit ihren Fähigkeiten das Team perfekt ergänzen konnte. Seit dem hat das Dreierteam daran gearbeitet, den Leuten eine unvergessliche Übernachtungsmöglichkeit zu bieten, welche gerade im Sommer 2020, wegen den vielen gescheiterten Urlaubsplänen, gerne gebucht wird.


Über uns
Iwan und Lukas haben sich während dem Studium kennengelernt und durch viele lustige gemeinsame Abende, abenteuerliche Reisen und interessante Projekte eine enge Freundschaft entwickelt. Corinne unterrichtet Yoga und leitet mit Freundinnen verschiedene Workshops wie Hypno-Yoga und Woodland Medicine. Unter anderem natürlich auch auf diesem magischen Waldplätzli unter freiem Himmel.

name: Wohnen mitten im lebendigen Zürcher Kreis 4
description:
Wohnen im Herzen des Zürcher Kreis 4.
Nur 10 Gehminuten vom Zürcher Hauptbahnhof entfernt und mitten im Geschehen wohnst du hier als Teil einer 3er-WG. Diverse Restaurants, Bars, Clubs, Parks und vieles mehr befinden sich in unmittelbarer Nähe. Ein Highlight: Im Erdgeschoss des Gebäudes ist die Kanonengassbar. Das Zimmer ist ca. 16qm gross, komplett möbliert und ist dank der 2 Fenster den ganzen Tag lichtdurchflutet. Und natürlich darfst du Wohnzimmer, Küche, Bad und Balkon mitbenutzen.

The space
Zu Fuss nur 10min vom Zürcher Hauptbahnhof entfernt wohnst du inmitten des pulsierenden Kreis 4. Das Zimmer ist Teil einer 3er-WG im 3. Stock und deine unkomplizerten Mitbewohner sind zwei berufstätige Jungs im Alter von 29 und 30 Jahren.,
Das Zimmer selbst hat ein 1.60m x 2.00m grosses und bequemes Bett (Matratze Myrbacka von IKEA). Es steht dir zudem ein grosser Bürotisch mit Bürostuhl zur Verfügung und in Teilen des Schrankes und Regals kannst du deine persö
neighborhood_overview: In der nahen Umgebung findest du alles was du brauchst. Egal ob Einkaufen, Restaurantbesuche, Pubcrawl, gemütlicher Nachmittag im Park, Schwimmen im See oder der Limmat, wilde Partynächte in einer der vielen Clubs oder Kulturangebote. Du erreichst fast alles zu Fuss und ansonsten steht dir mein Fahrrad zur freien Verfügung.
host_about:
sports and geography teacher
born in central switzerland, now living in Zürich,
travelling around the globe sometimes

name: Modern furnished apartment in the heart of Zurich
description:
Modern furnished apartment in the heart of Zurich.

This freshly renovated 1BR apartment is your best starting point to explore the beautiful city of Zurich. The apartment is located in "Kreis 4" , known for its great vibe, as well as restaurants and bars. Close to Zurich's Helvetia platz the flat is a 10 min walk from Zurich's main station.

The accommodation is ideal if you visit the City for leisure or business. Providing you with all you need, it will make it a home away from home!

The space
The modern apartment has two balconies and large windows, offering plenty of light. With its orientation you'll have the morning sun in the kitchen and the afternoon/evening light on side of the bedroom/2nd balcony and living room. The bedroom is equipped with a comfortable 140cm bed and large dressing. The modern bathroom offers a bathtub & shower. The kitchen is fully equipped and has a dining area. The large living room has a comfortable couch to re
neighborhood_overview: The district "Kreis 4" offers a great vibe with numerous restaurants and bars to choose from. The center of Zurich, as well as the two rivers, Sihl and Limmat, are within walking distance from the flat.
host_about: Being originally from Munich (Germany), I live and work in Zurich, Switzerland.

name: Comfortable, calm and nice
description:
Located in a nice & calm area.
Good connection to train (2minute) and tram/bus (3-4 minutes). Supermarket Migros nearby (3 Minutes).
City mainstation = 13 minutes by train.
Airport is 15 minutes by bus.

You live in a private room and can use the kitchen and all its facilities. Included is also:
->private bathroom, with toilette, bathroom sink, shower, cleaning liquids and towels.
-> regular cleaning service (every 2nd week)
-> washing machine + dryer
-> shared balcony & living room.

The space
You will live in your room with your personal bathroom. You are free to use the kitchen, and living room

Guest access
You can also use the balcony, kitchen and living room

train station,

host_about:

We (My boyfriend and me) live together and offer sometimes one room.

name: Nice, simple & modern apartment in central Zurich
description:
Nice modern little apartment with balcony located in a calm central area, ideal for single, couple, or small group of up to 3 people.

The space
The place is composed of a sleeping room, a little living room, a modern open kitchen, a modern bathroom and a balcony. Its setting makes it ideally for couple or a single person, however, the living room has a sofa bed which makes it doable for 3 people.

Guest access
All apartment for guest.

Other things to note
Little food shop in the building.

name: 3 room flat close to ETH&university
description:
The apartment has 3 rooms and there is space for up to 3 people. It's perfect for a couple or families and it's located very centrally in Zürich city, very close to the University and ETH. Well connected public transportation and the city center is reachable by walking distance or 5 min by tram.
Next to the proprety they are building a house, so it's possible that during the they there will be some noise.

The space
The apartment is on the groundfloor and has one bedroom with a 160cm-doublebed and a balcony. The livingroom also has a single bed and a crib. The kitchen is fully equipped, has a dining table and a sofabed. There is a coffee machine, a dish washer and the basic cookingtools. The toilet and the shower are separated.

Guest access
The whole apartment is at your disposal
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located close to the university (less than 10 min. by tram to Zürich main station). Several sights and attractions, restaurants, bars and museum are within walking distance. The old town is reachable in 20 min. walking or 10 min. by the tram/bus. It's a very quiet but central neighbourhood.

name: NEW: Renovated Studio Apt in Downtown Zurich
description:
Welcome to our newly renovated studio apartment in the Niederdorf district. Conveniently located with easy access to local attractions and the famous shopping streets of Zurich, the apartment features a separate bathroom and a fully equipped kitchenette with marble top and induction stove. The apartment has been furnished with you, our guests, in mind and is your home away from home.

The space
The apartment is ideal for 1-2 persons. Modern and comfortable for a couple, solo or business traveller. Freshly cleaned towels & bed linens (washed at 60 degrees C.) and a comfortable 160x200cm bed with mattress & topper awaits you. Kitchenette is fully equipped with microwave, refrigerator, Nespresso coffee maker, cooking utensils and a full set of cutlery. Hair dryer, iron & ironing board are also available. Apartment has been newly renovated to welcome you!

Other things to note
CLEANING PROTOCOL:

neighborhood_overview: Conveniently located just next to the Limmat in the charming historic old town of Zurich. A brief 2-minute walk to the famous shopping street of Bahnhofstrasse and 12 minutes walk to the University of Zurich makes this location ideal for anyone looking to be in the heart of the city centre, with many trendy cafes and restaurants in the vicinity.

name: New renovated 2-bed serviced apartment & parking
description:
This newly renovated & stylishly fully furnished 70 sqm serviced apartment with 2 bedrooms is ideally located in the vibrant district of Werd at Kalkbreite. Although you are right in the middle of it all, this is an ideal location for your comfort and privacy. Europaallee, Bahnhofstrasse and Paradeplatz are only a stone's throw away.

The big extra? A parking space in a parking garage around the corner.

The space
We do not only offer you a furnished apartment; here you get the all-inclusive living service. Enjoy the comfort of being completely furnished., everything is already there for you.

• Combined living & dining room
• Master bedroom with comfortable king-size double box spring bed and large closets with plenty of storage space
• Second bedroom with single or french double bed, desk and also plenty of storage space & closets.
• Second bedroom is adaptable to your needs; whether as a children's room, study or guest room
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located on the quiet one-way street, which is ideally embedded between the train station "Wiedikon" and the tramway station "Kalkbreite". From here you can quickly reach downtown Zurich, the airport or other cities like Zug, Lucerne and Basel. Right in the middle not just on the sidelines - this is where you can experience Zurich from its most exciting side.

name: "Margaritli" Cozy studio in the old town of Zurich
description:
Are you in Zurich for work or as a traveler and are you looking for a place to stay where you feel at home? Cozy studio right in the heart of Zurich's old town. The studio is very centrally located. Sights, bars, restaurants, shops and the main train station can be reached in a few minutes on foot.

The space
The studio is on the first floor. This cozy studio has a room with a comfortable bed, a round table and an LED TV, a bathroom with a shower, a well-equipped kitchenette and a coffee / tea corner.

Guest access

Other things to note
The waste must not be deposited in the staircase. In case of larger amount of waste please inform us. Use only black bags for waste. There are enough in the studio. Thank you in advance for your compliance.

name: Cozy 100m2 flat for 5 travellers with 2 bathrooms
description:
Large flat (100m2) for five travellers with 2 bathrooms. Near Schaffhauserplatz, 7 min by tram to Zurich main station, famous Bahnhofstrasse; Limmat river and vibrant Langstrasse in walking distance. Surrounded by various restaurants, parks & cafés.

The space
The flat has 100m2 with 2 large bed rooms, 2 bath rooms, a dining room connected with the living room, two balconies and a kitchen. Here is an overview about the sleeping rooms: - Two bed rooms with two beds (1.60m) for 4 people (25m2 and 21m2) - Huge and comfortable couch to accommodate the fifth person We will of course provide you with shampoo and shower gels so that it is easier for you to travel. Our kitchen is quite large and fully equipped. In the room you will find more information about the city and of course our WIFI connection. The flat itself is located in an ancient and beautiful building from the 1930's on the second floor without an elevator unfortunately.
neighborhood_overview: It takes only a few steps to get to the restaurants which are located in the neighbourhood. Only two minutes away you can enjoy a cozy brunch at Café des Amis, have a drink at fancy Kafischnaps, get fresh food at the bakery Wüst or at Migros, a coffee at Starbucks around the corner or enjoy italian pasta at La Casa or Scala. Only a short walk away, you easily get to the green and beautiful Irchel Park. Also, if you enjoy the nature and wish to sit at the Limmat river, just walk a few minutes down to the water.
host_about: Open minded world traveler - loves to explore new sports activities around the globe. Hope this Corona thing will end soon. Enjoy your stay in Zürich.

name: *Low pricing* Very spacious and quite apartment in the middle of Zurich (Apartment C)
description:
***VIEW NOW IN 360° MODE / COPY THE LINK BELOW***

https://www.remotely.tours/app/property/5fa03b718c20420017ca8b47

A wonderful spacious apartment, well furnished offering all amenities you need during your stay in Zurich for 1-5 guests. A supermarket is located in the same building and the tram stop "hottingerplatz" from where you are just minutes away from "kunsthaus/museum of arts" is litterally in front of the house. Bakeries, coffee, restaurants and pharmacy are across the street. The apartment is located in one of the posh areas of Zurich and surrounded by many old and nice townhouses great for nice walks.

The space
As you enter the house there is a big elevator to get to the apartment. Opening the apartments door you will have a entry area, the dining area and couch/tv area in front of you in an open space. There are big windows and a nice view. A balcony invites for a glas of wine or a cold beer during the warmer month. The bedrooms
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is situated in a wealthy area of Zurich. The apartment is located to the small ancient "village center" which offers all daily supplies you need. On foot you are in "niederdorf/old town zurich" in about 10min/1km). Museums like the museum of art or Kulturama (museum of culture) are in walking distance. Also theaters and the lake of zurich are just a walk away. I strongly recommend to have a walk to Kafi Paradiesli, Hofstrasse 19, 8032 Zürich, a very nice sweet little hidden coffee place with a small but good menu.
host_about:
Hi I'm Alex. I was born in Zurich, studied economics in Berlin and Dubai and am now back in Zurich were I am running a company in the real estate business.  

I like doing sports like tennis, sailing, volley etc but enjoy going out in Zurichs nightlife as well. I would describe myself as very open and spontaneous and love showing people what the city has to offer. 

As son of a family working mainly in the tourism branch i had many chances to visit many countries in the world and get to know a lot of different cultures which i think is very interesting and helpful in life. The good side effect is, that I enjoy showing guest around in Zurich and "share" what our City offers! 

Having into depth discussions suit me as much as going out and having fun.

hope to see you soon.

alex

name: Sunny & Stylish Apartment 20min from city center
description:
We offer a very nice, sunny and modern apartment in Zurich, inside a 3 family house recently renovated. It's on a very quiet location in a blind street at the golden coast of Zurich (Witikon). The bus stop that leads from and to the main station (Zurich HB) is 250m away. ALDI, Denner & Migros supermarkets are 280m away in a shopping mall and if you like jogging or nature, the forest it's at the end of the street.

The space
The apartment was recently renovated, we have a modern induction kitchen and a bathroom with a Geberit toiled/bidet plus a jacuzzi type bathtub for your enjoinment. There are two balconies, one looking forward to the lake and the other at the back of the kitchen. We have king beds(180x200cm) in all rooms. There is a fully equipped kitchen at your disposal. The living room has a smart TV, also a dining table for 6 persons.

Guest access
The apartment is located on the second floor. All the apartment is yours when you book,
neighborhood_overview:
We are in Witikon one of the most exclusive neighbourhoods in Zurich at the east side of the Lake, better known as the Golden Coast, because the sun reaches all year long. Close we have the Zurich Zoo and the Dolder Bath & Ice Skating. The woods are just at the end of the street and three supermarkets (ALDI, Migros and Denner) are on a shopping mall 280 meters away from the house.

The east side of the lake offers several distractions if you like art and culture, close is The Kunsthaus (Art Museum), The Bellerive Museum, The Tram Museum, The Corbusier House, The China Garden, the Opera House and of course many spots at the lake where you can take a swim or go for a picnic in summer.
host_about: We are Jürg and Valeria, we like to travel a around the world and know very well what are the amenities everybody seeks on vacation rental. We like to pay attention to details and try our best to keep the apartments clean and tidy for our guests. We are looking forward to be your host and give you a pleasant stay.

name: Warm and cozy place in Zürich
description:
Unsere kleine aber wunderschöne 3-Zimmer Wohnung befindet sich im Erdgeschoss. Die Wohnung befindet sich nur einige Gehminuten vom Bahnhof Zürich Binz entfernt. Den Zürich HB erreicht man bequem mit der Bahn in nur 5 Minuten. Ausserdem ist das hippe Quartier Wiedikon, mit seinen unzähligen Restaurants und Cafés, sehr nah. Auch Zürichs Hausberg, den Üetliberg, erreicht man direkt mit der Bahn. Zudem bietet das Quartier sehr viele Einkaufsmöglichkeiten und schöne Wege für tolle Spaziergänge.

The space
Unsere Wohnung ist wegen ihrer hohen Decke und den grossen Fenstern sehr hell und einladend. Neben einen Schlafzimmer, welches wir dir zur Verfügung stellen, kannst du den Wohnbereich mit Küche, den Balkon und das Badezimmer mitbenützen. Die Wohnung ist sehr herzlich und romantisch eingerichtet und wir freuen uns, unser Reich mit Dir zu teilen.

Guest access
Du darfst gerne alles mitbenutzen. Zur alleinigen Nutzung steht dir ein Schlafzimmer zur
neighborhood_overview: Einkaufsmöglichkeiten in der Nähe: Denner und Migros (Brunaupark) gleich um die Ecke. In 10’ Fussweg zu erreichen sind die Sihlcity mit verschiedensten Einkaufsmöglichkeiten und der Manesseplatz. Ruhige Nachbarschaft mit einem kleinen Park gleich vor der Haustür. Viele Spaziermöglichkeiten (z.B Panoramaweg mit Aussicht über Zürich) auch sehr nah.
host_about: talkative, spontaneous and friendly person who likes meeting new people and travelling!

name: large 6.5 rooms apartment with private parking
description:
The apartment has 6.5 rooms - a large living room and 5 bedrooms. There is an equipped kitchen with all the basic things you need. There are two bathrooms: one with a bathtub and a shower and a toilet. The other one with shower and toilet. It's perfect for a family, students or workers. The location is central in Zürich near Bahnhof Stettbach - well connected to public transportation.

The space
2 bedrooms have single beds, 3 bedrooms have a double bed.

Guest access
the parking spot is in front of the building.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located close to Bahnhof Stettbach. It's on the city border, so one side is very urban and the other is already green and in nature. There is a street with a tram stop right in front of the building.
Modifica
host_about:
Hello! :)
I'm Simone and I come from Switzerland. I love to travel with Airbnb and meeting locals! I also started to be a host and I love it! I like to lose myself in a new city and I love to welcome people in mine. Musik, travel, movies, art, friends and fun are some of the most important things for me. With them I will never grow old ;)
Hope to meet you soon
XX
Simone

name: The coziest apartment in Zurich
description:
I am looking forward to welcoming you to the coziest apartment you could ever get in Zurich.
It is bright, spacious, full of light, plants and books.
Conveniently located in one of the most vibrant neightbohoods of Zurich, full of cafes, shops and restaurants. Just a short walk from the River and only 3 min by tram from the Zurich Rail station (15 min walking).
This place is ideal for someone who looks for a "home away from home" and not just a place to sleep in Zurich.

The space
Bright, cozy, full of light, books, plants and positive energy
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in Kreis 6 - one of the trandiest and coziest (in my opinion). It is full of bars, shops, cafes and restaurant.
The highlight is Lette - the part of the River Limmat where the party is taking place in Zurich. Where you can swim, chill or even jump from the bridge into the river (if you are brave or crazy enough).
5 minutes walking, there is also a veeeeery beautiful park, which I love a lot where you can read a book, do yoga, picknick or just chill on one of the hommocks.
host_about:
Hi, my name is Irina but I like when people call me Liuna - the name my dad started calling me since I was little. 

I am so happy and grateful that our paths crossed even if only virtually for now! 


Let me share with you some information about myself. 
I lived in 7 countries and speak 7 languages. 
I cannot live without: traveling, sport (especially yoga and jogging), fruits, flowers and books.

Favorite continent to travel: Asia
Favorite country to live: Italy (but I LOVE Switzerland and especially Zurich where I currently live)
Favorite fruit: mango, but I go crazy about all what is in season. 

You will have a positive, vibrant and bubbly world citizen as host/guest with a lot of travel and life stories to tell (in lots of languages). 
Traveling, meeting new people and sharing life experiences is my biggest passion and I hope yours too. 

Hope to meet you soon and until then stay blessed, healthy and happy! 
Irina

name: Zwei Zimmer mit Balkon im tollen Kreis 4 in Zürich
description:
2 Zimmer mit Bad und Balkon in Mitten von Zürich direkt im Design- und Lifestyle Hotel Greulich. Keine Küche! Ideal um die Stadt zu erkunden, aber trotzdem Ruhig einen Aufenthalt zu geniessen. Für Homeoffice, Städtetrips, Wochenaufenthalter oder sonstige Reisende sehr geeignet! Gemeinsamer Balkon und Eingang aber ansonsten separat abgetrennte zwei Zimmern mit Bad. WLAN, Kaffeemaschine und Wasserkocher und ein Restaurant direkt nebenan ermöglichen einen relaxten Aufenthalt.

The space
Die Wohnung ist schlicht und modern möbliert liegt nah an den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln und in einem Quartier mit tollen Restaurants und erholsamen Parks.

host_about: Hi I'm Lea -I like nice things: objects and places created with quality and authenticity in mind – and realised with care. Things that make me smile. name: nice 3.5 rooms apartment very centrally located
description:
The apartment has 3 rooms and there is space for up to 5 people. It's perfect for a couple or families or friends and it's located very centrally in Zürich city, very close to the University and ETH. Well connected public transportation and the city center is reachable by walking distance or 5 min by tram.
Next to the proprety they are building a house, so it's possible that during the they there will be some noise.
By request it is also possible to rent a parking space.

The space
The apartment is on the first floor and has two bedroom with a 160cm-doublebed and a balcony. The livingroom also has a sofabed. The kitchen is fully equipped. There is a coffee machine (filter), a dish washer and the basic cookingtools. The toilet and the shower are separated.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located close to the university (less than 10 min. by tram to Zürich main station). Several sights and attractions, restaurants, bars and museum are within walking distance. The old town is reachable in 20 min. walking or 10 min. by the tram/bus. It's a very quiet but central neighbourhood.

description:
Hello, I am renting out my amazing apartment located right at the Zurich lake.

Very central location for exploring the city and enjoying summer/winter days in one of the many nearby leisure spots. The lake is 2min walk.

There are plenty of cafes, restaurants and bars within short walking distance (1 - 3min walk).

The neighborhood is quiet and peaceful at night, so if you're looking for a perfect spot to relax in the most beautiful area of Zurich you won't find anyting much better than this.

The space
The flat is located in the high-end area of Zurich.
The view from the window are directed towards an old castle and feels like in a Disneyland movie :)

There is also a fireplace and a cozy space to rest and read books on a hamac.

Kitchen is fully equipped with a glass door.

Guest access
A few grocerie stores are conveniently avaliable in the nearest surroundings.

As f
neighborhood_overview:
The lake is within 2min walk.

There are plenty of cafes, restaurants and bars within short walking distance too (1-3min walk) and for those looking for shopping experience the nearby Bahnhofstrasse offers more than enough occasions to splurge on luxury goods.

The tram stop of every major line can be found in the direct vicinity (3min walk) and the main train station is just a 15 - minute walk away.

A few grocerie stores are conveniently avaliable in the nearest surroundings (3min walk)

The neighborhood is quiet and peaceful at night, so if you're looking for a perfect spot to relax in the most beautiful area in Zurich you won't find anyting much better than this.

name: 3R in vibrant city center: river, bars&rest+office
description:
Guest access
3-room fully furnished apartment available, with two balconies on NE quiet street and SW to interior garden, featuring window blinds for full black-out option to reduce heat and with portable ventilator available as apartments in the area do not provide A/C - for a comfortable full-day working or sleeping. name: Private room in Wollishofen.-Dog lovers paradise.
description:
Sterling (4 years old quiet and cuddly French Bulldog) and Olli (human) looking forward welcoming you to our apartment in Zürich-Wollishofen (public transport zone 110).

The space
You are being offered a lockable private room.

You’ll share the remaining apartment with us. This includes the living area, dining area, kitchen, bath room (shower over bath) and the balcony.

Guest access
The apartment complex offers a washing machine and dryer which you are welcome to use (need to provide own laundry liquid or laundry powder)
neighborhood_overview:
I personally love living here because of its convenient location (public transport, Zurich lake, shopping and restaurants) all are reachable in 2 min to 15 min by foot.

Some noise can be heard in the apartment from the public transport and cars, but this can be minimised by closing the windows on the balcony and the rooms.
host_about:
Born in Germany, lived and worked over eleven years in the Northern Territory (Australia).

name: Super central, modern & bright apartment in Zurich
description:
The beautiful 2-room apartment is located just a few meters from the centrally located Kreuzplatz. It is modern and practically furnished and offers everything necessary for both vacationers and business travelers, such as a washing machine, dryer, fast WLAN, workstation with screen, comfortable couch with TV and much more.

You are in the middle of the most exclusive district of Zurich - Zurich Seefeld. The lake, Bellevue, Bahnhofstrasse and many other attractions are just a few meters away.

The space
The apartment is modern and stylishly furnished with high quality furniture. Thanks to high ceilings (3m), large windows and white walls, the apartment is very bright and flooded with daylight.
Since the apartment is still relatively new, some decorative elements and the lounge on the balcony are still missing. You can see from the pictures the current status of the room.
The living area was divided into 3 parts, a dining and living area, a sma
neighborhood_overview:
Shopping facilities: Within 20m you will find the biggest Migros of Zurich, a Coop, a Denner and various smaller stores.
Breakfast & Brunch: Right next to the house you will find the bakery Steiner, one of the best bakeries in Switzerland. Across the street you have the most famous brunch restaurant in Zurich - Bohemia.
Lunch & Breakfast: There are countless restaurants with cuisines from all countries. It is not worth starting a list here. But of course, I am always available for tips!
host_about: Studying Economics in Zurich, Switzerland. Founded 4 companies yet, many more to come. Traveling a lot and appreciating modern, clean apartments and nice, friendly people.

name: New Studio in the Center of Zurich Old Town11
description:
Brand new magnificent studio right in the heart of old town.
Perfect for both tourists and business travelers.
This is the best location in the whole city where all of Zurich comes alive with its buzzing downtown activities.
All the major restaurants, bars, coffee shops, museums of the city are around. The views of the city are breathtaking from across the street. All the city attractions are within walking distance.
Please send an inquiry message for long-term rental to get better price.
neighborhood_overview:
The most central location in the city of Zurich.
Just walk few minutes and you will reach all of Zurich attractions.

Bahnhofstrasse: 5 minutes walk
Limmat River: Across the street
host_about:
I have been traveling all over the world using Airbnb community as a guest and recently I have started to be a host as well to show the same kind of hospitality that I received from Airbnb hosts in different parts of the world.
I love everything Airbnb stands for: traveling and exploring, meeting new people along the way, experiencing a new destination like locals would do and sharing my favorite places in Zurich with people!
I'm a very gracious host and I love to entertain and make my guests feel at home. 
I look forward to welcoming you in my home!

name: Modern Duplex Zürich Center
description:
Cozy and modern 100m2 duplex in the city center of Zürich.
The appartement is very well located, 5 minutes walking distance from the main train station and 5 minutes walking distance from Limatplatz where you have access to the tram 4, 6, 13 and 17, 5.
The neighborhood is dynamic and there are plenty of restaurants and bars.
Looking for spending a nice weekend in Zürich? The flat is spacious, and you will have all you need.

The space
The duplex is very spacious (around 100m2). On the first floor you have the living room with a balcony and an opened kitchen. There is a dinning space and the bathroom. On the second floor (downstairs) you have a very spacious corridor (13m2) and two bedroom.

Guest access
You will have access to all the mentioned rooms.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is location is the city center where there is plenty of restaurant and bar.
host_about:
Hi there, I am Amandine and I come from France. I live in Zürich since 2015 and I looooove this city. 

My hobbies are paragliding, read and drink Wine ;) 

I am looking forward to your reservation!

description:
Fantastic one bedroom flat in the city center.
